source.title: 星洲炒米粉
ingredients: 适量蒜末大葱段干辣椒
steps: 以上是所需要的食材
一定要用到咖喱粉，一般超市都买得到，不能用咖喱块代替
米粉我是在网上买的专门做星洲炒米的粉，这种粉比一般的粉丝有弹性也韧一些，炒的时候没那么容易断。记得要提前用冷水泡1015分钟
1锅烧热加少量油，小火煸炒葱段蒜末和干辣椒
煸出香味后倒入处理好的虾仁
虾仁炒成红色就倒入洋葱胡萝卜和青椒丝一起煸炒几分钟。
蔬菜稍微炒软就加入火腿肠，再加少量盐和咖喱粉打个底味。炒蔬菜的时候可以稍微点一点热水更好熟
蔬菜基本都熟了就把事先泡好并沥去水分的粉丝倒入锅中一起炒，炒粉的时候沿着锅四周加入适量的油防止粘锅
粉丝炒23分钟就好，之后就可以开始调味了，先加入适量蚝油
根据自己的口味加适量的盐
最后加稍微多一点的咖喱粉
完成
黄灿灿的看着就好吃
ingredients_translated: 3 Rolls Sin Chew Fried Rice Noodles
Appropriate amount of minced garlic, green onion, dried chili
steps_translated: The above are the ingredients needed
Be sure to use curry powder, which can be bought in general supermarkets, and cannot be replaced by curry cubes

The rice noodles I bought online are specially made for Xingzhou fried rice. This kind of noodles are more elastic and tougher than ordinary vermicelli, and they are not so easy to break when frying. Remember to soak in cold water for 10-15 minutes in advance
Heat 1 pot, add a little oil, stir-fry onion, minced garlic and dried chili over low heat
After the aroma is released, pour in the processed shrimp
When the shrimps are fried into red, pour in the onions, carrots and green peppers and stir-fry for a few minutes.

When the vegetables are slightly fried, add the ham sausage, add a small amount of salt and curry powder to make a base taste. When frying vegetables, you can use a little hot water to make them more cooked

When the vegetables are basically cooked, pour the pre-soaked and drained vermicelli into the pan and fry together. When frying the noodles, add an appropriate amount of oil along the sides of the pan to prevent sticking to the pan
Stir-fry the vermicelli for 23 minutes, then you can start seasoning, first add an appropriate amount of oyster sauce
Add some salt according to your taste
Add a little more curry powder at the end
Finish
It looks delicious when it looks yellow

references.title: Singapore Noodles
ingredients: 1 lb ground pork (or beef or poultry)
steps: In a wok or large frying pan, scramble-fry pork with garlic, ginger, cayenne, curry, and green onion. (If you're not using lean meat, you may want to partially cook the meat by itself and then drain most of the fat before adding the other ingredients.).
Meanwhile, cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Add oyster sauce and soy sauce to meat mixture and toss well to mix thoroughly.
Drain spaghetti and add to meat. Toss to mix and serve.

source.title: 玉米鸡蛋羹
steps: 将鸡蛋打入容器中，不用太深的碗哦。
将鸡蛋顺着一个方向打成液体，按照鸡蛋液和热水的比例1：2，加入热水和少量食盐，搅拌均匀，也是按着同一个方向。
盖上保鲜膜。
放入蒸锅中蒸大概十分钟，郭盖不要盖严，留一个口。出锅即可。
steps_translated: Crack the eggs into a container, not too deep.
Beat the eggs into a liquid in one direction, according to the ratio of egg liquid to hot water 1:2, add hot water and a small amount of salt, stir evenly, and follow the same direction.
Cover with plastic wrap.
Put it in a steamer and steam for about ten minutes. Do not cover the Guo Gai tightly, but leave a hole. Serve out of the pan.

references.title: Chinese Chicken Corn Soup
steps: Combine chicken broth, corn and chicken in large saucepan. Bring mixture to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally. Blend cornstarch with cold water and add to soup.
Continue cooking, uncovered, for 3 minutes.
Beat egg whites until foamy; stir into soup.
Reduce heat and cook until foam is gone.
Garnish with parsley.
Serve hot.
One cup serving has 156 calories.

source.title: 鸡肉蘑菇炒面
steps: 面煮好，过凉水
鸡胸肉切丁，和打碎的鸡蛋放在一起
蘑菇和白菜切碎
炒鸡蛋和鸡胸，直至都变色可以放入蘑菇和白菜，加入盐和生抽
放面，再加一点生抽，炒熟出锅
steps_translated: Noodles cooked, rinsed with cold water
Chicken breast, diced, tossed with beaten eggs
chopped mushrooms and cabbage
Scramble eggs and chicken breasts until they change color, you can add mushrooms and cabbage, add salt and light soy sauce
Put the noodles, add a little soy sauce, fry until cooked

references.title: Chicken Chow Mein
steps: Combine all ingredients and half can of noodles.
Mix well. Place in square baking dish.
Sprinkle remaining noodles on top. Bake at 350° for 50 minutes.

source.title: 西红柿炒鸡蛋
steps: 两个鸡蛋，加适量料酒和盐，打散
西红柿洗净后切小块儿，去蒂
小葱洗净切段
热锅，放油，加入鸡蛋，待底部成型，用铲子将鸡蛋划散，关火盛出
开火，放油，加入葱段爆香，放入西红柿，快速翻炒，等西红柿出汁，断生，再加入鸡蛋翻炒，让鸡蛋糊上一层西红柿汁最好，最后加入适量盐翻炒几下出锅。
steps_translated: Two eggs, add some cooking wine and salt, beat
Wash the tomatoes and cut into small pieces, remove the stems
Wash shallots and cut into sections
Heat the pan, add oil, add eggs, wait until the bottom is formed, use a shovel to scatter the eggs, turn off the heat and serve

Turn on the fire, add oil, add scallions and sauté until fragrant, add tomatoes, stir-fry quickly, wait for the tomatoes to come out of juice, and then add eggs and stir-fry. It is best to let the eggs be covered with a layer of tomato juice. Take out the pan.

references.title: Stir Fry Tomato And Eggs
ingredients: 2 large tomatoes, cut into thin wedges
steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil is hot, add the eggs, and green onion; cook and stir until the eggs are almost solid. Add the tomatoes, and cook until eggs are firm. Season with salt, and serve.

source.title: 扬州炒饭
steps: 紫皮圆葱、黄瓜、红肠切小丁，胡萝卜切沫，备用
鸡蛋打散，用筷子高速搅打几下至出沫，下油锅炒散，盛出来，备用。炒的时候趁蛋液未凝固快速翻动锅铲，这样炒出来的蛋比较散。
起锅另放油，放入圆葱小火煸至圆葱酥黄，葱香四溢，加入胡萝卜和黄瓜丁翻炒，炒至黄瓜变色呈透明状，即可加入米饭。
待米饭炒匀，加入红肠和炒好的鸡蛋，翻炒几下，加盐调味即可出锅。小馋孩一口气吃了满满两碗，彻底打乱了我让他减肥的计划
steps_translated: Dice purple onion, cucumber, red sausage, mince carrot, set aside

Break up the eggs, beat them with chopsticks at high speed for a few times until froth comes out, fry them in an oil pan, take them out, and set aside. When frying, turn the spatula quickly while the egg liquid is not solidified, so that the fried eggs are relatively loose.

Put another oil in the pan, add the onion and stir-fry over a low heat until the onion is crispy yellow and the onion is fragrant, add carrots and diced cucumber and stir-fry until the cucumber changes color and becomes transparent, then add rice.

Stir the rice well, add red sausage and fried eggs, stir fry a few times, season with salt and serve. The little greedy boy ate two full bowls in one go, which completely disrupted my plan to let him lose weight

references.title: Yang Chow Fried Rice
ingredients: 4 large eggs, lightly beaten and divided
1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, divided
1 3/4 cups thinly sliced green onions, divided
1/4 cup lower-sodium soy sauce {Check for Gluten}
steps: Heat 2 teaspoons oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add half of eggs; swirl to coat bottom of pan evenly. Sprinkle with 1/8 teaspoon pepper and dash of salt; cook 3 minutes or until egg is done. Remove egg from pan; thinly slice, and set aside.

Wipe pan clean with a paper towel. Heat remaining 4 teaspoons oil in pan over medium-high heat. Add 1 cup onions, ginger, and garlic; stir-fry 30 seconds. Add remaining eggs and rice; stir-fry 3 minutes. Stir in half of reserved egg strips, remaining 3/4 cup onions, remaining 1/8 teaspoon pepper, soy sauce, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and peas; cook 30 seconds, stirring well to combine. Top with remaining egg strips and cilantro.

Chilling the cooked rice is the key to making delicious fried rice. Allowing the rice to chill overnight (or at least for a few hours) helps eliminate excess moisture, keeping the grains firm and separate. If you use hot, freshly cooked rice, you're likely to end up with mushier results.

source.title: 皮蛋瘦肉粥
steps: 大米洗净，用保鲜袋放在冰箱冷冻层。冷冻2小时以上，也可提前一晚放入，第二天早上取出。
猪肉切成丝，用盐、胡椒粉、食用油、淀粉搅拌均匀，用保鲜袋放入冰箱冷藏层，冷藏时长和大米一致。
皮蛋切块，姜切片。用保鲜袋放入冰箱冷藏层，冷藏时长与大米一致。
锅中沸水，放入冷冻的大米，熬制10分钟后，放入姜片，逐条放入肉丝，搅拌均匀后，再放入皮蛋，继续搅拌2分钟左右，即可出锅。盛入碗中后，可放入少许葱花。
steps_translated: Wash the rice and put it in the freezer in a fresh-keeping bag. Freeze for at least 2 hours, or put it in the night in advance and take it out the next morning.
Cut the pork into shreds, mix well with salt, pepper, cooking oil, and starch, and put it in the refrigerator in a fresh-keeping bag for the same length of time as the rice.
Cut the preserved eggs into pieces and slice the ginger. Use a fresh-keeping bag and put it in the refrigerator for the same length of time as the rice.

Boil water in a pot, add frozen rice, boil for 10 minutes, add sliced ​​ginger, add shredded pork one by one, stir evenly, then add preserved eggs, continue stirring for about 2 minutes, and then you can get out of the pot. After serving in a bowl, you can add a little green onion.

references.title: Congee
ingredients: 2 (6 ounce) fillets lean white fish, sliced
1/2 teaspoon soy sauce, or to taste
steps: Combine chicken stock, water, rice, 1/4 cup apple cider vinegar, fish sauce, ginger, salt, and sesame oil in a large stockpot; bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until congee has thickened to the consistency of a light porridge, about 3 hours.
Stir fish into congee and simmer until cooked through, about 10 minutes.
Serve congee in bowls topped with pickled vegetables, roast pork, scallions, and peanuts. Drizzle 1/2 teaspoon vinegar and soy sauce over toppings.

source.title: 鸡丝凉面
steps: 鸡腿退冰洗净，在冷锅中放入少许料酒，八角、生姜、葱段，加适量水，大火烧开后转中小火炖煮20分钟后将鸡腿捞出，放凉后手撕成鸡丝备用。
黄瓜切丝。
煮面条：在锅中加入少许盐，水沸后将面条下入，煮至9分熟沥水捞起，过凉水可饮用的纯净水，加入适量的油将面条拌匀，用风扇吹凉会摊开晾凉。
调味：底部码上黄瓜丝，放入适量面条和鸡丝，辣椒油视个人吃辣程度添加，淋上少许麻酱，加入适量姜蒜泥、酱油、醋，少许糖和香油，搅拌均匀即可食用。
ingredients_translated: Appropriate amount of ginger and garlic
steps_translated: De-ice and wash the chicken legs, put a little cooking wine, star anise, ginger, green onion in a cold pot, add appropriate amount of water, boil on high heat, turn to medium and low heat and simmer for 20 minutes, then remove the chicken legs, let it cool, and tear it into chicken pieces Wire spare.
Shred the cucumber.

Cooking noodles: add a little salt to the pot, put the noodles in after the water boils, cook until 9 minutes cooked, drain the water, pick up the pure water that can be used in cold water, add an appropriate amount of oil, mix the noodles well, blow them with a fan to cool them and spread them Leave to cool.

Seasoning: Put shredded cucumber on the bottom, add some noodles and shredded chicken, add chili oil depending on the level of spiciness you like, pour a little sesame sauce, add appropriate amount of ginger and garlic paste, soy sauce, vinegar, a little sugar and sesame oil, stir well and serve.

references.title: Asian Chicken Noodle Salad
ingredients: 5 green onions, chopped (top half tossed out)
steps: Mix up all ingredients except cabbage, sesame seeds, vegetable oil and chicken to make dressing.

Break ramen noodles into 4 pieces per package, toss out flavoring packages. Boil for 2 minutes only, no longer! Drain, and rinse with cool water until cold. While still in colander, toss with vegetable oil.
Combine cabbage, pepper, sesame seeds, noodles, chicken and dressing just prior to serving.

source.title: 葱爆牛肉
steps: 牛肉切片加料酒、生抽、淀粉喂好
大葱切丝、酱切丝、蒜切末
热锅冷油，加葱姜蒜爆锅，加喂好的牛肉
迅速翻拌将牛肉炒透
加入大葱翻炒
加入蒜苗
翻炒
出锅装盘
steps_translated: Add cooking wine, soy sauce and starch to sliced ​​beef
Shredded onion, shredded sauce, minced garlic
Hot pot with cold oil, add onion, ginger and garlic to fry the pot, and add fed beef
Stir quickly to fry the beef through
Add green onions and stir fry
add garlic sprouts
stir fry
out of the pan

references.title: Beef and Scallion Stir-Fry
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon crushed red-pepper flakes, plus more for serving (optional)
1 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon vegetable oil, such as safflower
1 1/4 pounds flank steak, cut diagonally across the grain into 1/2-by-3-inch strips
2 bunches scallions, trimmed, sliced crosswise 1 1/2 inches thick, white and green parts separated
steps: In a small bowl, whisk together the water, hoisin sauce, vinegar, cornstarch, 3/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon red-pepper flakes.
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet over high.
Pat-dry steak with paper towels.
In two batches, cook steak until lightly browned, turning once, about 2 minutes per batch.
Transfer meat to a plate.
Add remaining teaspoon oil to skillet along with garlic and white parts of scallions.
Cook, tossing often, until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Whisk hoisin mixture to combine; add to pan along with scallion greens.
Return meat to pan; cook, tossing to coat steak with sauce, 1 minute.
Remove from heat.
Serve immediately over rice and sprinkled with more red-pepper flakes, as desired.

source.title: 凉拌豆芽
steps: 1豆芽，红萝卜丝，菠菜，用开水过一下。捞出来放盆里。2蒜泥，姜沫，大葱放在上面，用热油浇一下。3一勺半盐，一勺凉拌汁，一勺醋，一勺芝麻香油，一勺胡椒粉。拌开即可。绿豆芽也是同样的。
steps_translated: 1 Bean sprouts, shredded carrots, and spinach, boiled for a while. Take it out and put it in a basin. 2 Put minced garlic, minced ginger, and scallions on top, and pour hot oil over it. 3. One and a half teaspoons of salt, one teaspoon of cold dressing, one spoon of vinegar, one spoon of sesame oil, and one spoon of pepper. Just toss. The same goes for mung bean sprouts.

references.title: Bean Sprout Salad
ingredients: chopped red pepper, fresh or dried to taste
steps: Rinse bean sprouts, removing any green shells that may be left.
Place in large colander and pour boiling water over sprouts to blanch.
Combine remaining ingredients and mix with sprouts. Serve warm or cold.

source.title: 麻婆豆腐
steps: 肉馅加少许生抽，少许淀粉搅拌均匀。热锅凉油倒入肉馅，迅速炒散，小火炒干水气，倒入少许开水继续炒干点，起锅备用。
豆腐切成小块，放入开水锅，舀入少许盐焯水，水开后煮两分钟，沥水盛入盘中待用。
热锅热油，倒入郫县豆瓣酱，小火炒出红油，大约用时1分钟，舀入油辣子，再倒入事先剁碎的豆豉，继续炒香，30秒，加入开水熬1分钟。
倒入豆腐块，煮大约两分钟，其间推动豆腐，使其与汤汁融合，后放入蒜苗段，蒜苗段事先切好，蒜苗头斜切，蒜苗叶直切，都切成2厘米长。
再加入之前炒的肉绍，轻轻地推动锅里的材料，可以尝尝咸淡，酌情增添盐。倒入1勺料酒在锅里，放一点点白糖提鲜只要一点点，尝不出甜味
最后勾薄芡，烧一分把钟就大功告成了。
上桌前撒点花椒面在豆腐上。
steps_translated: Add a little light soy sauce and a little starch to the meat filling and stir well. Pour the cold oil into the hot pot and pour the minced meat, stir-fry quickly, stir-fry on a low heat to dry up the moisture, pour a little boiling water and continue to fry until dry, and set aside.
Cut the tofu into small pieces, put it in a boiling water pot, scoop in a little salt and blanch the water, cook for two minutes after the water boils, drain and put it in a plate for later use.

Heat the oil in a hot pan, pour in the Pixian bean paste, stir-fry the red oil on a low heat, it takes about 1 minute, scoop in the oily chili, then pour in the pre-chopped tempeh, continue to fry, 30 seconds, add boiling water and boil for 1 minute .

Pour in the tofu cubes and cook for about two minutes. During this time, push the tofu to make it blend with the soup, and then put in the garlic sprouts. The garlic sprouts are cut in advance. The garlic sprouts are cut obliquely, and the garlic leaves are cut straight.

Then add the meat that was fried before, gently push the ingredients in the pot, you can taste the saltiness, and add salt as appropriate. Pour 1 spoonful of cooking wine into the pot, put a little sugar to enhance the freshness, just a little bit, you can't taste the sweetness
Finally, thicken the cornstarch, cook for a minute and you're done.
Sprinkle some pepper noodles over the tofu before serving.

references.title: Mapo Tofu
ingredients: 1/4 lb ground pork (optional) or 1/4 lb ground chicken (optional)
12 1/3 ounces silken tofu (preferably firm or extra-firm)
1 leek, ends trimmed, sliced and rinsed
1/2 cup low sodium chicken broth or 1/2 cup vegetable broth
steps: Combine garlic, spicy bean paste, chili powder, soy sauce, black bean garlic sauce and (optionally) meat.
Cut the tofu into 1/2 to 3/4-inch cubes.
Heat a wok or large skillet over high heat and add the vegetable and chili oil.
When the oil is very hot and starting to smoke, add the ground meat or seasoning mixture and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes with meat, 30-60 seconds without.
Add the leek and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
Stir the cornstarch into the broth and add to the wok along with the tofu. Stir gently until thoroughly combined.
Lower the heat and simmer for 3-4 minutes.
Turn off the heat. Add in the ground Szechuan peppercorns, stir gently, and allow to cook in the residual heat for another 1-2 minutes.
Serve hot over white rice.

source.title: 鱼香肉丝
steps: 主料：里脊肉木耳冬笋胡萝卜辅料：香菜葱蒜调料：糖鸡粉香油海鲜酱油郫县豆瓣酱花椒粉陈醋第一步：备料胡萝卜切丝香菜切段冬笋切丝木耳切丝里脊肉切丝葱切葱花蒜切片第二步：腌制肉丝肉丝放入容器中加入料酒加入香油海鲜酱油鸡粉水淀粉抓匀第三步：滑油锅中烧油下入肉丝滑油第四步：炒制锅中留底油下入葱蒜郫县豆瓣酱花椒粉胡萝卜木耳冬笋明油肉丝海鲜酱油鸡粉糖陈醋香菜炒匀盛盘
steps_translated: Main ingredients: tenderloin, fungus, winter bamboo shoots, and carrots Accessories: coriander, onion, garlic Seasoning: sugar chicken powder, sesame oil, seafood, soy sauce, Pixian bean paste, pepper powder, mature vinegar Step 1: Prepare ingredients, shred carrots, shred coriander, shred winter bamboo shoots, shred fungus, shred tenderloin Cut chopped green onion and garlic into slices. Step 2: Put marinated shredded pork into a container, add cooking wine, add sesame oil, seafood, soy sauce, chicken powder, water, starch, and grasp evenly. Leave the bottom oil in the frying pan, add onion, garlic, Pixian bean paste, pepper powder, carrots, fungus, winter bamboo shoots, shredded pork, seafood, soy sauce, chicken powder, sugar, vinegar, and parsley, stir well and serve

references.title: Boiled Pork With Garlic Sauce
steps: 1. Put the meat in a saucepan. Add water, enough to cover the meat. Add sliced ginger and scallions, too. Boil it about 40-50 minutes (until well done).
2. Cool the meat and thinly slice.
3. Make sauce. Mix all ingredients.
4. Put the lettuce leaves on the plate, then put on the sliced pork. Serve with sauce. Serves 4.

source.title: 糖醋豆腐
steps: 豆腐切长方条，不要太薄，煎至两面金黄
调糖醋汁，与高升排骨酱汁一致，1勺料酒，2勺老抽，3勺糖，4勺醋，5勺水，搅拌均匀
倒入煎好的豆腐中，煮至汤汁收干即可，也可稍微留点汤汁
steps_translated: Cut the tofu into rectangular strips, not too thin, and fry until golden on both sides
Adjust the sweet and sour sauce, which is the same as Gaosheng ribs sauce, 1 spoon of cooking wine, 2 spoons of dark soy sauce, 3 spoons of sugar, 4 spoons of vinegar, 5 spoons of water, stir well
Pour into the fried tofu and cook until the soup dries up, or you can leave a little soup

references.title: Sweet And Sour Tofu
steps: Drain tofu and cut into 1-inch cubes.
Combine flour, eggs and salt.
Mix well.
Dip each tofu cube in batter.
Deep fat fry in oil until golden brown.
Drain and keep warm in oven.

source.title: 酸菜猪肉饺子
steps: 猪肉馅是自己绞的，肥肉和瘦肉大概5比4，因酸菜油大会更好吃一些，特增加了一些荤油。
酸菜是买袋装的，里面是已经切好的酸菜丝，自己再剁比较容易。葱姜切末，荤油起锅，放入葱姜末炒出香味关火，待锅凉一些放入猪肉馅搅拌均匀，再把酸菜末挤出多余水分和肉馅搅拌，放入适量的盐和生抽调味。
面粉我买的是高筋面粉，对和面技术不好的朋友高筋面粉可是避免煮饺子时变成片汤的尴尬，我自己经验，每次可以多包一些放入饺子盒冰箱冷冻。
热气腾腾的酸菜猪肉馅饺子出锅啦
steps_translated: The pork stuffing is made by myself, and the ratio of fat meat to lean meat is about 5 to 4. Because the sauerkraut oil meeting tastes better, some meat oil is added.

Pickled cabbage is bought in bags, and the inside is shredded sauerkraut, so it is easier to chop it yourself. Mince scallion and ginger, put meat oil into the pot, add minced scallion and ginger and stir-fry until fragrant, turn off the heat, wait for the pot to cool down, add pork stuffing and stir evenly, then squeeze out excess water from sauerkraut and stir with meat stuffing, add appropriate amount of salt and raw meat Smoked to taste.

The flour I bought is high-gluten flour. For friends who are not good at making noodles, high-gluten flour can avoid the embarrassment of turning dumplings into slices of soup. From my own experience, I can wrap some more each time and put them in the dumpling box and freeze them in the refrigerator.
Steaming dumplings filled with sauerkraut and pork are out of the pan

references.title: Pork And Sauerkraut With Dumplings
steps: Rub pork with salt and pepper. Place in a pot (with a lid - if possible) and cover with water, adding onion cut into pieces.
Boil meat until tender, remove excess fat.
Add sauerkraut and simmer about 20 minutess.
Mix dry dumpling ingredients together.
Add milk gradually mixing well then add the melted butter.
Drop by spoonsful into boiling pork and kraut.
Cook 15 minutes covered.

source.title: 香芹爆炒鸡肝
steps: 将鸡肝去筋去膜儿泡去血水切片儿用醋、料酒、淀粉抓匀腌制
香芹去叶儿切段儿备用
热锅凉油油热放几粒麻椒爆香下入葱蒜炒香
下入鸡肝炒至加入耗油、酱油白糖翻炒三分钟
加入香芹段儿翻炒两分钟加入少许食盐迷迭香装盘即可
steps_translated: Remove tendons and membranes from chicken liver, soak to remove blood, slice into slices, marinate with vinegar, cooking wine and starch
Remove leaves and cut parsley into sections for later use
Heat the cold oil in a hot pan, put a few peppercorns and sauté until fragrant, add green onion and garlic and fry until fragrant
Add the chicken liver and stir-fry for three minutes after adding oil consumption, soy sauce and white sugar
Add parsley and stir-fry for two minutes, add a little salt and rosemary and serve

references.title: Liver With Peppers And Onions
ingredients: 1 pound liver, cut into bite-size pieces
1 large onion, thinly sliced into rings
1 medium green pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 sweet red pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces
steps: In a large bowl or resealable plastic bag, combine the flour, salt and pepper. Add liver; toss to coat. In a large skillet, cook onion and peppers in 2 tablespoons oil until crisp-tender. Remove from pan; set aside.

In same skillet, cook and stir liver in remaining oil for 5-7 minutes or until no pink remains. In a small bowl, combine the cornstarch, broth and soy sauce until smooth; stir into liver. Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Return vegetables to the skillet; heat through. Serve with rice or noodles.

source.title: 简单盐焗鸡
steps: 买三黄鸡半只，洗净
抹上盐焗鸡粉，腌制10-30分钟，而我腌的比较久，腌了一个下午
电饭锅放入蒜和姜，我家里的电饭锅总是会焗得蒜和姜都糊了，不知道别家会不会糊
把腌制好的鸡放电饭锅里，按下煮饭键就好了，我的是煮一次后翻身再煮一次，避免鸡肉不熟
美味的盐焗鸡就做好了，虽然颜值不怎么样，味道还是不错的
ingredients_translated: 1 packet of salt baked chicken powder
steps_translated: Buy half a three-yellow chicken, wash it
Spread salt-baked chicken powder and marinate for 10-30 minutes, and I marinated for a long time, and marinated for an afternoon
Put garlic and ginger in the rice cooker, the rice cooker in my house will always burn the garlic and ginger, I don’t know if it will be burnt in other homes
Put the marinated chicken into the rice cooker and press the cooking button. Mine cooks once and turns over to cook again to avoid the chicken being undercooked
The delicious salt-baked chicken is ready, although the appearance is not very good, the taste is still good

references.title: Salt-Baked Chicken
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.
Put the salt in a heavy pot with a lid, slightly larger than the chicken.
Place the pot, uncovered, over medium heat until the salt is very hot, stirring from time to time, about 30 minutes.
Scoop most of the salt into a large bowl, leaving a 1 1/2-to-2-inch layer of salt in the bottom of the pot.
Place the chicken over the salt layer, breast side up.
Spoon the remaining salt over and around the chicken, so that it is completely buried in salt.
Cover the pot with the lid.
Bake until the chicken is cooked through, about 1 1/2 hours.
Scrape the salt from the chicken and remove from the pot.
Wipe off as much of the salt as possible and let stand for 10 minutes.
Carve the chicken and serve.

source.title: 蚝油芥蓝
steps: 芥蓝洗净，将叶，茎交叉迭放，用保鲜膜包紧。
把包好的芥蓝放入合适的微波耐热容器中，放入烹饪箱第0层上，选择微波1000烹煮2分30秒，取出，迅速用冷水冲洗一下，沥干，切成6-7厘米长的条状，置盘。
另取一个微波耐热容器，把所有调味料放入拌匀，放入烹饪箱第0层，选择微波1000爆香1分钟后，取出，淋于菜上，即成。烹饪程序烹饪程序：微波1000放置层数：微波耐热容器，第0层烹饪时间：3分30秒烹饪容器：微波耐热容器
ingredients_translated: 250g kale with old leaves removed, 12-15cm long
steps_translated: Wash the Chinese kale, stack the leaves and stems crosswise, and wrap them tightly with plastic wrap.

Put the wrapped kale into a suitable microwave heat-resistant container, put it on the 0th floor of the cooking box, select microwave 1000 to cook for 2 minutes and 30 seconds, take it out, rinse it with cold water quickly, drain it, and cut it into 6- 7 cm long strips, put on a plate.

Take another microwave heat-resistant container, put all the seasonings into it, mix well, put it into the 0th floor of the cooking box, select microwave 1000 to saute for 1 minute, take it out, pour it on the vegetables, and serve. Cooking program Cooking program: Microwave 1000 Number of layers: Microwave heat-resistant container, layer 0 Cooking time: 3 minutes 30 seconds Cooking container: Microwave heat-resistant container

references.title: Chinese Broccoli With Oyster Sauce
steps: If using Chinese broccoli, trim 1/2 inch from bottoms of stalks; discard. (Stalks more than 1/2 inch in diameter should be halved lengthwise.) Slice stalks into 2 1/2 x 1/4-inch sticks. (With regular broccoli, just use the florets.)

Combine 6 cups water and 1/2 teaspoon salt in a large pot over high heat; bring to a boil. Add the broccoli stalks (or florets); blanch 2 minutes. Remove and drain in a colander. Add the leaves to the pot; blanch 1 minute. Drain broccoli in a colander.

Heat the canola oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add the ginger; stir-fry 15 seconds. Add broccoli, remaining 1/2 teaspoon salt, oyster sauce, and sugar; stir-fry 1 1/2 minutes, or until broccoli is crisp-tender. Remove from heat; drizzle with sesame oil.

source.title: 老虎菜
steps: 辣椒和香菜洗净
剁成丁
洒入盐，醋，生抽，香油调味
steps_translated: Pepper and parsley washed
Dice
Sprinkle with salt, vinegar, light soy sauce, sesame oil to taste

references.title: Tiger Salad (
ingredients: 3 celery ribs (5 ounces; 140g), preferably cut from closer to the heart,
1/2 long hot green pepper (1/2 ounce; 14g), split in half, each half then cut on a bias (see note)
2 scallions, sliced thinly on a bias (2 ounces; 56g)
1 small bunch cilantro leaves and tender stems, torn by hand or chopped into 3-inch lengths (1 ounce; 28g)
3/4 teaspoon Diamond Crystal kosher salt; if using table salt, use half as much by volume
steps: In a medium mixing bowl, combine celery, long hot green pepper, scallions, and chopped cilantro.
In a small bowl, combine rice vinegar, salt, and sugar, then stir to dissolve the salt and sugar completely. Add soy sauce and sesame oil and stir to combine.
Pour dressing over vegetables, tossing to ensure thorough distribution.
Mound vegetables on a serving plate and sprinkle dried shrimp all over the top. Serve immediately.

source.title: 滑蛋虾仁
steps: 虾，剥壳洗净去虾线，晾干可忽略，尽可能保留虾膏。
热锅下油，中大火炒熟虾仁，盛起
蛋加盐搅开，随便搅开，随意，把虾仁丢进去
热锅下油，混合物倒进去搅拌，一直搅，会有滑蛋的效果。鸡蛋不用熟透也可
steps_translated: Shrimp, peeled and washed to remove the shrimp line, dry it and ignore it, keep the shrimp paste as much as possible.
Put oil in a hot pan, fry the shrimps on medium-high heat, and serve
Stir the egg with salt, stir it casually, throw the shrimps in it
Put oil in a hot pan, pour the mixture into it and stir, keep stirring, it will have the effect of slippery eggs. Eggs don't have to be cooked

references.title: Shrimp With Scrambled Eggs
ingredients: 1 lb. raw shrimp, peeled and deveined
steps: White Sauce:
Heat 2 tablespoons butter in saucepan over medium heat.
Sprinkle in flour; mix rapidly.
Cook 1 minute. Pour in hot milk and nutmeg.
Cook sauce for 8 minutes over very low heat, stirring occasionally.

source.title: 醉鸡
steps: 大火水滚落所有材料转小火煮25分钟关火焖至放凉
加入600cc酒泡至6小时即可砍件上盘
steps_translated: Turn the fire to low heat and cook for 25 minutes, turn off the heat and simmer until cool
Add 600cc wine and soak for 6 hours, then chop and serve

references.title: Drunken Chicken
steps: Prepare an outdoor grill for medium heat.
Rinse chicken and pat dry. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Coat with mustard.
Pour half of beer out of can and refill with Italian style dressing. Place can on a disposable baking sheet. Set chicken on beer can (it acts as a stand), inserting can into cavity of the chicken.
Place baking sheet with beer and chicken on the preheated grill. Cover, and cook about 1 hour, until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear.

source.title: 葱油饼
steps: 用刚烧开的水烫面，不要一次加太多水，先往里倒少许水，用筷子搅拌，不够再加，当面拌至一个一个小团时，边上还有一些干的面粉，就不要再加开水了，要加一点点凉水把面活好
活好的面团，放在面板上醒一醒，然后就把葱叶切成小丁，为葱花
把面团拉成长条状，分成相同大小的剂子，然后逐个团圆按扁
取一个面团用擀面棍擀成圆形饼皮，在饼皮上撒上盐盐多放些更香，用手抹匀
抹好盐再倒一些植物油，用小刷子涂满整张面皮
将葱花均匀地撒在已涂好的面皮上，然后把面皮包裹葱花从一端卷向另一端
将卷成条状的面再卷成圆形，然后压扁擀成扁平的圆形状饼皮即可
做好一个饼坯停下，这时需要把电饼铛内部上下都刷一层薄油并开始预热，然后再做两个饼坯，电饼铛也已准备好，放入饼坯合上盖子
三四分钟后就能闻到淡淡的饼香，打开盖将饼翻面再盖三分钟两面金黄即可出锅
steps_translated: Use freshly boiled water to scald the noodles, do not add too much water at one time, first pour a little water into it, stir with chopsticks, add more if there is not enough, when the noodles are mixed into small balls, there is still some dry flour on the side, do not Add more boiling water, add a little cold water to make the noodles well
Put the live dough on the panel to wake up, then cut the scallion leaves into small cubes, and serve as chopped scallions
Pull the dough into long strips, divide them into equal-sized pieces, and press them flat one by one.
Take a piece of dough and use a rolling pin to roll it into a round cake. Sprinkle salt on the cake and add more salt to make it more fragrant. Spread it evenly with your hands
Spread the salt and pour some vegetable oil, and use a small brush to cover the entire skin
Sprinkle chopped green onion evenly on the coated dough, then wrap the dough with chopped green onion and roll from one end to the other
Roll the strip-shaped dough into a round shape, then flatten it and roll it into a flat, round cake.

Make a biscuit and stop. At this time, you need to brush a thin layer of oil on the inside of the electric baking pan and start preheating, then make two biscuits. The electric baking pan is also ready, put in the biscuit and close it cover

After three or four minutes, you can smell the faint fragrance of the cake. Open the lid and turn the cake over and cover it for another three minutes. Both sides will be golden and then it will be out of the pan.

references.title: Scallion Pancakes
steps: In a bowl combine shortening scallions salt and sugar. Mix into a paste. Refrigerate.

Mound flour on work surface. Make a well and pour the hot water with one hand, using fingers of the other to mix. When all the water has been poured, knead mixture into dough.(if dough is too dry add anoother tablespoon water)
Using a scraper pick up dough and continue to knead for 5 to 7 minutes, until smooth and elastic. Cover with damp cloth and allow to rest for 30 minutes.
Divide dough into 4 equal pieces. On a lightly floured surface roll each piece into a 12 inch long roll 1 inch in diameter. Cut each roll into 2 1/2 inch pieces.

With rolling pin roll each piece to a 10 by 4 inch rectangle with rounded edges. Spread 1 1/2 tablespoons of filling along center of dough. Fold both sides so they meet over the filling. Flatten gently. Fold in half lenghtwise and press again. Pick up dough by the ends and gently stretch it, hitting it gently on the work surface at the same time.

Place the folded edge outward bring the left end to the middle creating a circle. Bring the right end around as far as possible to the left. Slip ends between folds of douugh and press gently. Press gently again so that the roll becomes a solid pancake.
In a heavy skillet heat oil and fry pancakes on both sides until golden brown. Remove drain and serve immediately.

source.title: 三杯鸡
steps: 增加个笔记本功能好吗
steps_translated: Would you like to add a notebook function?

references.title: Three-Cup Chicken
ingredients: 1 chicken fresh, chopped into identical-sized parts
1 chinese rice wine scant cup Hua Tiao, or COGNAC!
1 bulb garlic separated into individual cloves, skins on
1 tablespoon rock sugar thumb size, or 2 fine sugar - a little more or less won't hurt
3 inches spring onions large bunches of, cut into 1 inch lengths
steps: Marinate chicken with soy, sesame oil and rice wine. At least for 6 hours, although overnight is best.
Take the chill off the meat. Heat up some sesame oil in a wok or claypot until it is sizzling hot.
Throw in garlic, ginger and spring onions. Fry briefly till fragrant. Add in chicken and sear.
Keep stir-frying. Pour in the marinade liquid and the sugar. Continue to cook on medium.
Once you have a rolling boil, cover the wok/claypot and let it simmer over a small flame, until all the liquid has disappeared and the chicken is on the cusp of burning.
There should hardly be any gravy left. The chicken should be caramelised (charred at parts, even) and sizzling when served.

source.title: 鸡肉炒饭
steps: 先加热油锅，放入蒜泥爆香
放入鸡丝翻炒
加料酒翻炒
加入适量的冷饭
加入鸡蛋再翻炒
炒至均匀，加入生抽，盐和蚝油，出锅即可
所有食材准备
steps_translated: First heat the oil pan, add garlic and sauté
Add shredded chicken and stir fry
Add cooking wine and stir fry
Add appropriate amount of cold rice
Add eggs and stir fry
Stir fry until even, add light soy sauce, salt and oyster sauce, and serve
All ingredients are ready

references.title: Chicken Fried Rice
steps: Combine chicken and soy sauce; let stand 15 minutes.
Heat oil over medium heat; add rice and cook until golden brown, stirring frequently.
Add chicken and broth; reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 20 to 25 minutes, or until rice is tender.
Remove cover; stir in onion, green pepper, celery and broccoli.
Cook until liquid is absorbed.
Serve immediately with extra soy sauce.

source.title: 红烧肉
steps: 五花肉切块，葱挽结，留一根葱叶切细丝最后留作点缀
五花肉放锅里干煸出油，到表面微微金黄色盛出备用
锅里剩下很多油，不喜油多的倒掉一部分，留一点底油放冰糖炒糖色，炒到棕红色把五花肉放进来
翻炒均匀后加入生抽一点点老抽
加入葱姜等调料，加黄酒100ml可不加加入少许水，转小火慢炖40分钟我用的珐琅锅锁水性比较好，所以加少许水即可，普通锅酌情增加水量
大火收汁，留点汤汁拌米饭
最后开盖大火收汁即可，放上葱丝
steps_translated: Cut the pork belly into pieces, tie the scallion in a knot, leave a scallion leaf and shred it for garnish
Put the pork belly in a pot and stir-fry to remove the oil until the surface is slightly golden brown and set aside

There is a lot of oil left in the pot. If you don’t like too much oil, pour out part of it. Leave a little bottom oil and put rock sugar to fry the sugar color. Stir-fry until brown-red and put the pork belly in
Stir well and add light soy sauce a little dark soy sauce
Add scallions, ginger and other seasonings, add 100ml of rice wine, do not add a little water, turn to low heat and simmer for 40 minutes
Collect the juice on high heat, leave some soup to mix with rice
Finally, open the lid and collect the juice on high heat, put onion shreds

references.title: Braised Pork Belly
ingredients: 5 pounds pork belly, cut into 6-inch pieces
steps: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. Heat 3 tablespoons of the oil in a large saute pan over medium-high heat.
When the oil begins to smoke, carefully place one piece of pork in the saute pan and sear, turning once, until golden.
Remove to a plate and repeat with the remaining pieces of pork.
Set aside.
Carefully add the beer to the drippings in the pan and cook, scraping up the cooked bits with a wooden spoon, until reduced.
Heat the remaining 5 tablespoons of oil in a large flame-proof roasting pan over medium heat.
Add the celery, onions, carrots, garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, until caramelized, 8 to 10 minutes.
Add the pork to the roasting pan.
Add the deglazed pan juices and enough chicken stock to cover the pork and vegetables.
Add the peppercorns, thyme, bay leaves and 2 generous pinches of salt.
Cover the pan with foil and braise for 3 hours.
Remove the foil and roast 30 minutes more.
This will allow the pork to gain a beautiful color and for the braising liquid to reduce.
Let the pork cool in the braising liquid for 30 minutes to increase tenderness.
Remove the pork from the roasting pan and strain the braising liquid.
Refrigerate separately until ready to use.
The pork can be served sliced or shredded.

source.title: 椒盐虾
steps: 面粉和生粉加水混合在一起搅拌，加入盐和胡椒粉五香粉一起搅拌均匀。
倒入洗净的虾，裹上浆糊。
热油炸起来，先炸一部分。
炸好再全部倒入锅中一起复炸一次捞起。
又脆又香还可以当零食吃哦
一蒸一炸的海鲜餐不用半个小时就搞定。
steps_translated: Mix flour and cornstarch with water and stir together, add salt and pepper allspice powder and mix well.
Pour in the cleaned shrimp and coat with the paste.
Fry in hot oil, part of it first.
After frying, pour them all into the pan and fry again.
Crispy and fragrant, you can also eat it as a snack
The steamed and fried seafood meal can be done in less than half an hour.

references.title: Salt And Pepper Shrimp
ingredients: 3 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon kosher salt, divided
2 large egg whites, at room temperature 30 minutes
3 tablespoons plus 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper (not fine)
2 cups sliced (1/8 inch thick) fresh jalapeno (about 8 chiles)
2 teaspoons flaky sea salt, such as Maldon, or to taste
steps: Cut shell along back of each shrimp with small kitchen shears (do not peel) and devein, then snip off legs.
Heat oil to 400°F in an 8-to10-quart heavy pot.
Toss shrimp with 1 tablespoon kosher salt and let stand 5 minutes. Rinse with cold water, then drain and pat dry.
Meanwhile, pulse egg whites in a blender until watery, then put in a bowl.
Stir together cornstarch, 3 tablespoons pepper, and 2 tablespoons kosher salt in another bowl.

Toss half of shrimp with 1/2 teaspoon each of kosher salt and pepper in a third bowl; dip in egg white, letting excess drip off, then lightly dredge in cornstarch mixture, shaking off excess. (Coating should be as light as possible.) Fry until crisp and cooked through, 1 1/2 to 2 minutes. Transfer with a slotted spoon to paper towels to drain.
Season, coat, and fry remaining shrimp.
Reduce oil temperature to 375°F.

Fry half of chiles with half of cilantro until cilantro just starts to turn dark green and chiles are wilted (do not brown chiles), about 30 seconds. Transfer with a slotted spoon to paper towels to drain. (Cilantro will crisp as it cools.)
Repeat with remaining chiles and cilantro.
Serve shrimp topped with fried chiles and cilantro and sprinkled with sea salt. Serve immediately.

source.title: 糖醋鱼
steps: 鱼处理干净，将两面鱼身各片开四五刀，沥干备用
用1勺料酒，2勺生抽，1小勺盐腌制10分钟左右
葱头切小段，葱尾切细丝，姜切丝，蒜剁成蒜蓉，剁椒切成薄片
调汁：在小碗中倒入1勺料酒，2勺生抽，4勺醋，3勺白糖，5勺清水搅拌均匀，另外再拿个碗用适量干淀粉和清水搅拌均匀
锅中放油，油温大火烧至180度，鱼裹上干淀粉，放入锅中后转小火炸至两面金黄盛出
锅中留少许底油，烧至五成热，改小火放入葱姜蒜爆香
倒入调好的料汁烧开
烹入淀粉水勾芡，如果太浓稠再加点清水，直至调整到自己满意的状态
起锅将芡汁淋到鱼身上
steps_translated: Clean the fish, cut the two sides of the fish into four or five slices, drain and set aside
Marinate with 1 spoon of cooking wine, 2 spoons of light soy sauce, and 1 teaspoon of salt for about 10 minutes
Cut the onion into small pieces, cut the tail of the onion into shreds, shred the ginger, chop the garlic into minced garlic, and cut the chopped pepper into thin slices

Juicing: Pour 1 scoop of cooking wine, 2 scoops of light soy sauce, 4 scoops of vinegar, 3 scoops of sugar, and 5 scoops of water into a small bowl and stir evenly. In another bowl, mix well with appropriate amount of dry starch and water
Put oil in the pot, heat the oil to 180 degrees, coat the fish with dry starch, put it in the pot, turn to low heat and fry until golden on both sides.
Leave a little base oil in the pot, heat it to 50% heat, change the heat to low heat, add onion, ginger and garlic and sauté until fragrant
Pour in the prepared sauce and bring to a boil
Add starch water to thicken it, if it is too thick, add some water until it is adjusted to your satisfaction
Take the pot and pour the sauce over the fish

references.title: Sweet And Sour Fish
ingredients: 1 pound fish fillets, such as cod, haddock, or sea bass
1 tablespoon Chinese rice wine or dry sherry
3 tablespoons rice vinegar, or red or white wine
1 tablespoon cornstarch mixed with 2 tablespoons water
steps: Rinse the fish fillets and pat dry. Cut into 2-inch squares. Add the fish to the marinade ingredients, using your fingers to mix in the ingredients and adding the cornstarch last. Marinate the fish for 15 minutes.

While the fish is marinating, prepare the sauce and vegetables. In a small bowl, mix together the chicken broth, soy sauce, rice wine or sherry, tomato paste, vinegar and sugar. In a separate small bowl, dissolve the cornstarch in the water.
Blanch the snow peas in boiling water until they turn bright green. Plunge briefly in cold water. Drain thoroughly. Cut the bell pepper in half, remove the seeds and cut into cubes.
Heat the oil to between 360 and 370 degrees Fahrenheit. Add the marinated fish cubes. Deep-fry until they are golden brown. Remove and drain on paper towels.
Remove all but 2 tablespoons oil from the wok. Add the ginger and green onion and stir-fry until aromatic (about 30 seconds). Add the snow peas. Stir fry for a minute and add the red bell peppers.

Push the vegetables up to the sides of the wok and add the sauce in the middle. Bring to a boil. Add the cornstarch and water mixture, stirring to thicken. Serve the fish on a platter, covered with the sweet and sour sauce and vegetables.

source.title: 叉烧包
steps: 这样就可以蒸了
成功了
steps_translated: so that it can be steamed
succeeded

references.title: Barbecue Pork On Buns
steps: In dutch oven, combine first nine ingredients. Summer uncovered 20 minutes.
Add meat, ketchup and Worcestershire sauce. Simmer slowly 45 minutes.
Serve on buns or french bread.

source.title: 家用叉烧酱
steps: 叉烧汁：糖酱油玫瑰露酒芝麻酱花生酱盐13香姜蒜这些配料按照自己个人喜欢添加你会在制作中找到很多乐趣的。以上做法是家庭简单做法如果没烤箱可以拿来蒸一点要阉过夜这样子才入味千万不要炸因为糖粉足很容易就糊了。
steps_translated: Barbecued pork sauce: sugar soy sauce, rose wine, sesame sauce, peanut butter, salt 13. Ginger and garlic. Add these ingredients according to your personal preference. You will find a lot of fun in the production. The above method is a simple family method. If you don’t have an oven, you can use it to steam a little. It needs to be castrated overnight so that it tastes good. Don’t fry it because the powdered sugar is easy to paste.

references.title: Chinese Barbecue Sauce
steps: Mix all ingredients in a bowl,( or a jar with a tight fitting lid), until the sugar is dissolved. Refrigerate until you are ready to use it.

*You can set aside some for use as a dipping sauce, but you must first bring it to a full rolling boil, over med. heat, then reduce the heat to low, and simmer until it is thick, and slightly reduced.
**When you are ready to cook, marinate meat for 4-24 hours, turning once every two hours. You then grill or broil the meat until it is cooked through,(and slightly charred- this adds to the flavor!).

source.title: 叉烧包子
steps: 1先放入高筋面粉在碗里2一小碗温水倒入酵母、泡打粉、蛋清、奶粉、白糖进行搓揉3盖上保鲜膜进行发酵，天气热大概两个钟看到面团发涨就可以了，为了口感和营养加了好些料
发酵面团时可以制作叉烧了，偷偷告诉你们我买了现成的叉烧肉把叉烧切碎倒入酱油、蚝油、淀粉搅拌均匀即可做馅。毕竟是第一次做包子就先省一些时间啦，熟练后下回自己买肉来做叉烧咯
拿出发酵好的面团，放一些玉米油不让它粘手
揉成长条，撒一些干面粉在上面，搓揉时玉米油已经被吸收，干面粉可以把它们分离开，用刀切成均匀小块，用擀面杖把它们都弄成圆形像饺子皮
把擀好的面皮里放入叉烧，捏成像扇子一样把馅裹好即可，第一次包有点不堪入目呀这形状
小锅放入冷水，用纱布垫着包子，中火12分钟左右打开盖子看看包子变大就熟了，试蒸了一个来尝尝，还别说美味至极
steps_translated: 1. Put high-gluten flour in a bowl. 2. Pour yeast, baking powder, egg white, milk powder, and sugar into a small bowl of warm water and knead. 3. Cover with plastic wrap to ferment. If the weather is hot, it will take about two minutes to see the dough rise. It's ok, I added a lot of ingredients for taste and nutrition

When the dough is fermented, you can make char siew. I will tell you secretly that I bought ready-made char siu pork, chop the char siu into soy sauce, oyster sauce, and starch, and mix well to make the stuffing. After all, it’s the first time to make steamed buns, so save some time. After you’re proficient, next time you’ll buy meat yourself to make char siu.
Take out the fermented dough and put some corn oil to keep it from sticking

Knead into long strips, sprinkle some dry flour on top, the corn oil has been absorbed during kneading, the dry flour can separate them, cut them into uniform small pieces with a knife, and use a rolling pin to make them into round shapes like dumpling wrappers
Put the rolled dough into the char siu, pinch it like a fan and wrap the stuffing. The first time the wrapping is a bit unsightly, the shape

Put cold water in the small pot, cover the buns with gauze, and open the lid for about 12 minutes on medium heat to see if the buns are bigger and cooked, try steaming one to taste, let alone delicious

references.title: BBQ Pork
steps: Combine all ingredients except sugar and mustard in heavy pot.
Add enough water to cover meat.
Slowly cook until meat falls of the bone (approx 3 hours).
Remove pork from pot and put in frying pan.
Let simmer.
Stir continuously until juice is absorbed.
Cut/shred meat while in pan.
Add sugar and mustard.

NOTE: To save time I usually use a pressure cooker for the meat, instead of adding enough water to cover the meat, I add about 3 cups and cook at 10 lbs pressure for 50-60 minutes That time is from the time that the cooker comes to pressure.

After it has cooled the meat has usually fallen completely off and the bone is clean, remove the bone then stir and simmer - if it tastes too vinegary to you, then add some more water and simmer it off.
It's usually fine for me.
Add the rest of the ingredients.

source.title: 糖醋里脊
steps: 把里脊肉切成筷子粗细的丝。
面粉：生粉12加泡打粉。加水调好。可以用一个肉条试一下。然后醒粉15分钟。
用一个肉条试一下。然后醒粉15分钟。
面糊不掉就好
4成油炸熟。5成油复炸油翻小泡就是5层肉丝要用筷子捡一头。竖着下去。
炸好沥干
要炒的时候再5成油复炸
锅里留底油，加番茄沙司，一点水，糖，盐一点，味精，一点，白醋。最后放水淀粉勾芡。把里脊放进去翻炒两下就可以出盘了
装盘
steps_translated: Cut the tenderloin into chopstick-thin shreds.
Flour: raw powder 12 plus baking powder. Add water and adjust well. You can try it with a meatloaf. Then wake up the powder for 15 minutes.
Try it with a meatloaf. Then wake up the powder for 15 minutes.
It's good if the batter doesn't fall off
4 into deep-fried. 50% oil re-fried and turned into small bubbles is 5 layers of shredded pork, which needs to be picked up with chopsticks. Go down vertically.
deep fried and drained
When it is time to fry, add 50% oil and fry again

Leave the base oil in the pot, add tomato sauce, a little water, sugar, salt, monosodium glutamate, a little white vinegar. Finally add water starch to thicken. Put the tenderloin in and stir-fry for a couple of times, then it’s ready to serve
plate

references.title: Sweet And Sour Pork
ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. lean pork, cut in 2 x 2 1/2-inch strips
1 small green pepper, cut in strips
steps: Brown pork in a small amount of fat and 1/2 cup water.
Simmer until tender.
Drain pineapple (reserve juice).
Combine sugar and cornstarch.
Add pineapple juice, vinegar, soy sauce and salt. Add to pork and simmer until thick.
Add pineapple, pepper and onion.
Cook 2 to 3 minutes.
Serve over rice.

source.title: 拍黄瓜
steps: 先把黄瓜洗净，放在案板上。
准备一把菜刀，重重的从头到尾这样拍下去，来回拍两遍，你看黄瓜就已经裂开啦。
然后再切成容易入口的小块。既然叫拍黄瓜，就一定要这样用拍的，而不能是切的，拍了之后才容易拌入味。
接着来捣蒜，做凉菜是一定少不了蒜的，否则你肯定做不出来饭店那种味道的。把几瓣蒜放到蒜臼里，捣成蒜泥。我用的这个是大理石的，够重才好用。
再来调汁，生抽2大勺约30克，醋2大勺约30克，糖1大勺约15克，盐适量，辣椒油1小勺约5克，花椒油1勺约5克，再把捣好的蒜泥放进去，拌匀。关于拌黄瓜的料，其实你有什么都可以放进去，真的可以很随意的，不要拘泥吖。
把黄瓜和料汁倒在一起，拌匀，然后放到冰箱里冷藏20分钟再吃，味道刚刚好呀。
你做好了之后记得拍照给我，在微博上小羽私厨的桐小羽，我会选出棒棒的作品赠送小礼物呀。
steps_translated: Wash the cucumber first and put it on the chopping board.
Prepare a kitchen knife, and shoot like this from the beginning to the end, back and forth twice, you can see that the cucumber has split.
Then cut into small pieces that are easy to eat. Since it is called patting cucumbers, it must be patted like this, not cut, because it is easy to mix in the flavor after patted.

Then come to smash the garlic, garlic must be indispensable for making cold dishes, otherwise you will definitely not be able to make the taste of the restaurant. Put a few cloves of garlic into the garlic mortar and mash it into mashed garlic. The one I used was marble, heavy enough to work well.

Then adjust the juice, 2 tablespoons of light soy sauce about 30 grams, 2 tablespoons of vinegar about 30 grams, 1 tablespoon of sugar about 15 grams, appropriate amount of salt, 1 teaspoon of chili oil about 5 grams, 1 teaspoon of pepper oil about 5 grams, and then Put the mashed garlic in and mix well. Regarding the ingredients for mixing cucumbers, in fact, you can put in whatever you have, it’s really optional, don’t stick to it.
Pour the cucumber and the sauce together, mix well, then put it in the refrigerator for 20 minutes before eating, the taste is just right.
After you are done, remember to take a photo for me. Tong Xiaoyu of Xiaoyu’s private chef on Weibo, I will choose a great work and give a small gift.

references.title: Chinese Cucumber Salad
steps: Cut cucumber in 1/2 lengthwise.
Scoop out seeds and slice thinly.
Sprinkle cucumber with salt and let stand about 30 minutes in a colander.

source.title: 鸡汤乌冬面
steps: 鸡腿一只，斩成小块过沸水汆烫去血沫，捞出备用香菇几朵用温开水泡发洗净备用
锅中添足量水，加入鸡肉、香茹、姜片、葱、炖煮15-20分钟
加入乌冬面煮至软熟即可
steps_translated: One chicken leg, cut into small pieces, blanch in boiling water to remove blood foam, take out a few spare shiitake mushrooms, soak them in warm water and wash them for later use
Add enough water to the pot, add chicken, xiangru, ginger slices, green onions, and simmer for 15-20 minutes
Add udon noodles and cook until soft

references.title: Chicken And Udon Noodle Soup
ingredients: 10.5 oz chicken breast, cut into strips
1 None small carrot, peeled, cut into thin matchsticks
2 oz miso paste, combined with 5 cups hot water
4 None spring onions, trimmed, cut thinly on a bias
steps: Combine egg and cornstarch. Add chicken and toss to coat. Lightly coat a wok with oil. Stir-fry garlic and chicken over high heat for 4 mins, until golden. Add carrot and cook for 1 min. Add soy sauce and beansprouts. Cook for 1 min.
Meanwhile, add noodles to miso soup mixture and cook according to package directions. Distribute between 4 serving bowls. Top with chicken mixture. Sprinkle with spring onions to serve.

source.title: 凉拌海带丝
steps: 海带泡发切丝备用
热水煮海带15到20分钟
用凉水冲冷，再用凉开水泡半个小时
姜蒜辣椒切好备用
锅里放油加入辣椒姜蒜炸香
海带控干水后加入以上配料，再倒入炸香的辣椒姜蒜油拌匀放冰箱一夜入味即可吃
steps_translated: Kelp Soaked Hair Shredded
Boil kelp in hot water for 15 to 20 minutes
Rinse with cold water, then soak in cold water for half an hour
Chopped Ginger Garlic Chili
Put oil in the pan, add chili, ginger and garlic and fry until fragrant
After the kelp is drained, add the above ingredients, then pour in the fried chili, ginger and garlic oil, mix well and put it in the refrigerator overnight to taste.

references.title: Seaweed Salad
ingredients: 1 small carrot, peeled and sliced paper-thin
2 ounces daikon radish, peeled and thinly sliced
1 small cucumber, peeled and thinly sliced
steps: Put the dulse and wakame in a large bowl and cover with cold water.
Let soak 5 to 10 minutes, until softened.
Drain in a colander, pat dry and place in a serving bowl.
To make the dressing, whisk together the rice vinegar, sugar, ginger, wasabi powder, soy sauce and sesame oil in a small bowl.
Spoon half the dressing over the seaweed, add the lime juice and toss gently.
Taste and add a small amount of salt if necessary.
Surround the salad with the carrot, radish, daikon, cucumber and avocado.
Season them lightly with salt and drizzle with the remaining dressing.
Sprinkle the salad with the white and black sesame seeds, pumpkin seeds and green onions.

source.title: 菠萝炒饭
steps: 米饭乘出，打散，冰箱冷藏隔夜。不要用刚做好的米饭。这样做出来的你一粒一粒的
配料剩下来的
该洗洗，都切丁。
凤梨切丁盐水泡着。忽略我剩了好多自己吃的
鸡蛋放一点料酒和盐。搅匀。
鸡蛋下锅过一下，呈出备用。
锅底留油，先下香肠最好是腊肠，炒出香味，再把别的下下去，不用刻意留意顺序，洋葱稍微炒软一点就行。
放入米饭，搅拌均匀，倒入2勺生抽，看口味，可以放一点白糖。
总觉得吃这个要放点泰国的东西。哈哈哈哈。鱼露。一般泰国吃的还会放点椰浆
放入菠萝
撒上葱花，搅拌均匀即可
装盘出锅，开整。
光盘行动哈哈哈哈
steps_translated: Take out the rice, break it up, and refrigerate overnight. Do not use freshly made rice. You made it one by one
ingredients left over
It should be washed and cut into cubes.
Diced pineapple soaked in salt water. Ignore that I have a lot of leftovers to eat
Add a little cooking wine and salt to the eggs. Stir well.
Put the eggs in the pan for a while and set aside.

Leave the oil at the bottom of the pot, put the sausage first, preferably the sausage, and fry the aroma, then put the others down, don't pay attention to the order, just fry the onion a little bit softer.
Put in the rice, stir well, pour in 2 spoons of light soy sauce, depending on the taste, you can add a little sugar.
I always feel that I need to put some Thai things in this dish. Ha ha ha ha. fish sauce. Generally, Thai food will also put some coconut milk
put pineapple
Sprinkle with scallions and mix well
Put it out of the pan and turn it on.
disc action hahahaha

references.title: Pineapple Fried Rice
steps: Preheat the oven to 324 degrees. Grease a small baking sheet.

Press the tofu in a paper towel to absorb the excess water. After pressing, cut the tofu into 1/2-inch cubes. IN a bowl, toss tofu with soy sauce until each cube is coated. Place in one layer on the prepared baking sheet. Bake for 45 minutes, turning the tofu a couple of times with a spatula. Remove from oven and set aside.
To prepare pineapple, cut in half lengthwise using a sharp knife. Remove the flesh and cut into bite-sized pieces. Set aside 1 1/2 cups for this recipe, and save the rest for another use.

In a large skillet or wok, heat oil over medium-high heat and saute onions until soft and lightly browned. Season with salt. Add garlic, curry, coriander, and chili-garlic sauce, and let cook for a few more minutes. Add cashews, carrots, peas, raisins, rice, broth, pineapple, and tofu. Cook until heated through and adjust salt to taste.

source.title: 土豆炖牛肉
ingredients: 土豆、牛腩、花椒、大料、香叶、盐、酱油、葱、姜
steps: 牛腩切小块在沸水中焯去血沫，另起一锅烧热适量油，油温7成热时加入切好的葱姜片爆香，然后加入焯好的牛肉块大火快炒一下，同时加入酱油和料酒比例为21，接着加入些许热水，没过牛肉即可，最后将炒锅里的牛肉和汤汁一起倒入压力锅，再加入切好的土豆块，焖煮1小时就好啦。
我用的是电压力锅，所以时间需要长一些，普通压力锅应该最多40分钟就ok了。如果没有压力锅，要用普通锅煮1个半小时。。。单机的土豆要在最后的25分钟加。
ingredients_translated: Potatoes, beef brisket, pepper, aniseed, bay leaves, salt, soy sauce, green onions, ginger
steps_translated: Cut the beef brisket into small pieces and blanch it in boiling water to remove the blood foam. Heat up an appropriate amount of oil in another pot. When the oil temperature is 70% hot, add the sliced ​​green onion and ginger and sauté until fragrant. Then add the blanched beef cubes and stir-fry quickly. Add soy sauce and cooking wine with a ratio of 21, then add some hot water, just cover the beef, and finally pour the beef and soup in the wok into the pressure cooker, then add the chopped potatoes, and simmer for 1 hour. .

I use an electric pressure cooker, so it takes a little longer, and a normal pressure cooker should be ok at most 40 minutes. If you don't have a pressure cooker, cook in a regular pot for 1.5 hours. . . The stand-alone potatoes should be added in the last 25 minutes.

references.title: Beef Stew With Mashed Potatoes
ingredients: 1 None large onion, cut into wedges
steps: Preheat to 325°F. Combine celery, onion, wine, apricots and herbs. Set aside 30 mins.

Heat oil in a large Dutch oven over high heat. Dredge meat in flour, shaking off excess. Working in batches, brown meat for 3-4 mins. Set aside. Add wine mixture to pan and cook, stirring, for 2-3 min, until celery is tender. Return meat to pan and cook, stirring, for 1-2 mins. Add stock and bring to a boil. Cover then transfer to oven to braise for around 1 1/2 hours.
Add mushrooms. Return to oven and cook, covered, for another 20-25 mins, until meat is tender.
For mashed potatoes, boil potatoes in salted water for 20-25 mins, until tender. Drain and mash with milk and butter. Season and serve with beef stew.

source.title: 红豆汤
steps: 姜切成丝，和红豆放入米酒中，搅匀浸泡8小时
浸泡好的红豆放入锅内，大火煮沸，搅拌一下，调成小火熬制30分钟。
ingredients_translated: Moderate amount of ginger with skin
steps_translated: Cut the ginger into shreds, put the red beans into the rice wine, stir well and soak for 8 hours
Put the soaked red beans into the pot, bring to a boil over high heat, stir a bit, then turn to low heat and simmer for 30 minutes.

references.title: Red Bean Soup
steps: Soak red beans overnight in cold water to cover.
When ready to cook, drain in colander and put them with the other ingredients into a heavy 8 to 10-quart pot or kettle.
Bring to a boil over high heat, then lower heat and simmer for 5 hours.
Turn off heat; remove ham bones and scoop out the pieces of ham.
Strain the soup through a coarse sieve into a large bowl, mashing whole beans with a wooden spoon.
Remove about 3/4 cup of bean solids from sieve and put them in bowl with ham.
Cover with plastic wrap; refrigerate for later use.
Put the thick creamy soup back into pot and warm over low heat for about 5 minutes, stirring to keep it smooth.
Serve piping hot over rice.

source.title: 豉油鸡
steps: 鸡肉洗净砍对半待用
锅里放上次用剩的蒸鱼鼓油加上水，大概可以淹住鸡肉一半以上就好。
烧开了水放点料酒放入鸡肉，中火慢慢焖半个小时。
中途要给鸡翻面才好入味，最后大收汁，要是不急着吃可以泡一会更上色。
捞起鸡肉砍件，淋一点汁更好味道，剩下的汁水保存起来冷了冰速冻。
steps_translated: Wash and chop the chicken in half
Put the leftover steamed fish drum oil and water in the pot, which can cover more than half of the chicken.
Boil the water, put some cooking wine into the chicken, and simmer slowly on medium heat for half an hour.
In the middle of the chicken, you need to turn it over to taste better, and finally collect the juice. If you are not in a hurry to eat, you can soak it for a while to make it more colorful.
Pick up the chicken and cut it into pieces, pour a little juice for better taste, save the remaining juice and freeze it for quick freezing.

references.title: Soy Sauce Chicken
steps: Place cut up chicken into a baking pan.
Melt butter and place over the chicken.
Pour soy sauce over the chicken.
Place in oven preheated at 350°.
Cook for 1 hour.
Excellent with white rice.

source.title: 牛肉炒面片
steps: 青椒，西葫芦切丁，洋葱切丝。西红柿碎。买的牧标排酸牛肉。切丁，用生抽老抽料酒盐，13香，鸡蛋液，一点淀粉，抓起来，抓匀，腌10几分钟。揪片煮8成熟捞出过凉水备用。西红柿洋葱和蒜爆炒，放入西葫芦青椒丁，炒好的鸡蛋碎。放生抽老抽炒变色，倒入面片，拌匀放盐，小火炖2分钟入味即可
steps_translated: Green pepper, diced zucchini, shredded onion. Chopped tomatoes. Bought sour beef beef. Dice, use light soy sauce, cooking wine, salt, 13 spices, egg liquid, a little starch, grab it, grab it evenly, and marinate for 10 minutes. Pull the slices and cook for 8 to mature, remove them and put them in cold water for later use. Stir-fry tomatoes, onions and garlic, add diced zucchini and green peppers, and smash the fried eggs. Add light soy sauce and stir-fry to change color, pour in noodles, mix well, add salt, simmer for 2 minutes on low heat to taste

references.title: Beef Chow Mein
ingredients: 2 lb. round steak, cut into small chunks
1 small bottle lite soy sauce or to taste
1/3 c. or more water (to cover bottom of pan)
steps: You will need 4-inch deep large frypan or pot.

source.title: 海南鸡饭
steps: 图1
图2
图3
图4
图5
图6

figure 2
image 3
