references.title: Hainanese Chicken Rice
ingredients: 2 each scallions, spring or green onions including the green tops, bruised
2 each scallions, spring or green onions including 1 inch of the green tops, finely chopped
1/2 each napa (Chinese) cabbage cored and sliced
1 x salt and black pepper to taste
1 each scallions, spring or green onions including 1 inch of the tender green tops, chopped
1 x cilantro fresh strips. for garnish
steps: For the ginger-green onion sauce:
Combine ginger & salt in a mortar and pound to a paste.
Add the green onions.
Heat oil until almost smoking and pour over the paste mixture.
Stir and mix well.
Sweet chilli sauce:
Combine ingredients in a mortar and pound to a paste.
Add the sesame oil.
Soy Sauce:
1/4 cup dark soy sauce
Cabbage Soup:
Pour the chicken stock into a saucepan over high heat, add the cabbage and cook for 2 minutes.
Season with salt & pepper.
Add the spring onions.
1 cucumber, peeled and sliced 2 tomatoes, sliced fresh coriander sprigs
Garnish chicken with coriander sprigs

source.title: 腰果鸡丁
steps: 鸡胸肉切丁，用生粉、酱油、油腌制10分钟
热锅倒入油，油要多点。接着放入腰果，炸，炸到你觉得可以哈哈哈哈哈哈哈，我是看它变成金黄色就捞起来了
腰果炸好后，捞起腰果，装出部分油，留些在锅里。接着倒入鸡丁翻炒，鸡丁变色后，放入菜椒和腰果翻炒，最后放盐调味。
steps_translated: Diced chicken breast, marinated with cornstarch, soy sauce and oil for 10 minutes
Pour oil into the hot pan, more oil is needed. Then put in the cashew nuts, deep fry until you think it’s okay hahahahahahaha, I picked it up when it turned golden brown

After the cashew nuts are fried, scoop up the cashew nuts, drain some of the oil, and keep some in the pot. Then pour in the diced chicken and stir-fry. After the diced chicken changes color, add peppers and cashew nuts and stir-fry. Finally, season with salt.

references.title: Cashew Chicken
ingredients: 3 to 4 chicken breasts, cut into bite size pieces
steps: Dip chicken pieces in beaten eggs.
Shake chicken in a bag of flour (plus a little cornstarch).
Deep fry until brown.
Place chicken in baking dish, cover with cashews, onion and sauce.
Bake at 250° for 15 to 20 minutes.

source.title: 酸辣汤
steps: 所以食材洗净切好
起锅烧油下西红柿炒烂后觉得没什么颜色的可以加点番茄酱
后换小锅吧，炒好的西红柿和浓汤宝一个，放进去加入香菇木耳
开了后，放嫩豆腐，火腿丝，鸡腿菇，盐，鸡精，糖，生抽，白胡椒后开锅放玉米淀粉水
放打好的鸡蛋
放香菜，香葱，腊八醋，香油
今天还吃的水煮鱼片，下次有时间咱们来做这个菜谱
ingredients_translated: a little spoon of chicken essence
Spoon laba vinegar according to your own taste
steps_translated: So clean and chop the food
After frying the tomatoes in the pan and frying them, you can add some tomato sauce if you feel that there is no color
Let’s change to a small pot later, put a fried tomato and thick soup treasure, put it in and add mushrooms and fungus
After opening, put tender tofu, shredded ham, Coprinus comatus, salt, chicken essence, sugar, light soy sauce, white pepper, then open the pot and put cornstarch water
put beaten eggs
Put coriander, chives, laba vinegar, sesame oil
I still eat boiled fish fillets today, let’s make this recipe next time if I have time

references.title: Hot And Sour Soup
ingredients: 1 oz. golden needles, soaked and halved
1/4 lb. tofu, cut into 1/4 x 1/4 x 2 inch strips
2 Tbsp. wood ears or cloud ears, sliced
steps: Heat the broth to a boil.
Add pork, ginger root, and black mushrooms.
Cook for about 3 minutes.
Remove ginger root.
Add remaining ingredients except cornstarch, water, eggs, and green onions.
Reduce heat and simmer 2 minutes.
Combine cornstarch with the water and stir until blended.
Add to soup mixture and cook until thickened and clear.
Remove from heat and slowly stir in beaten eggs.
Garnish with green onions.

source.title: 茶叶蛋
steps: 鸡蛋洗干净放锅里
清水没过鸡蛋，大火煮开，中小火8分钟
煮好后倒掉开水，迅速给鸡蛋冲凉，蛋皮冷却后你可以这样做：一手一个蛋互碰还可以这样做：擀面杖伺候，一顿敲鸡蛋外壳出裂纹为目的
锅中倒入清水，大火煮开，放入所有备好的香料
水再一次开时放盐、糖、生抽、老抽搅匀，小火煮十分钟
有人煮半小时以上，您看吧
关火，浸泡4小时以上，入味
直接睡了踏实泡了一夜
烂葱捡出去了
来一个吧
steps_translated: Wash the eggs and put them in the pot
The water has not covered the eggs, boiled on high heat, medium and low heat for 8 minutes

Pour off the boiled water after cooking, and quickly cool the eggs. After the egg skins are cooled, you can do this: touch an egg with one hand, and you can also do this: serve with a rolling pin, and knock the egg shells for the purpose of cracking
Pour water into the pot, bring to a boil over high heat, and add all the prepared spices
When the water boils again, add salt, sugar, light soy sauce, and dark soy sauce, stir well, and cook on low heat for ten minutes
Some people cook for more than half an hour, you see
Turn off the heat, soak for more than 4 hours, taste
Just fell asleep and soaked all night
The rotten onion was picked up
come one

references.title: Chinese Tea Eggs
steps: Boil eggs until hardboiled.
Remove from water and tap the shells with a spoon to create the cracks. Don't overdo it or else the shells will fall off!

Return the eggs to water and add soy sauce, salt, tea, and spice pack. Add the soy sauce progressively, stop adding if the soup is too salty. The water will boil down and concentrate, so no need to be too aggressive.
Simmer on low-medium for about 1 hour.
Peel eggs and put eggs with "soup" in fridge for storage

source.title: 萝卜糕
steps: 萝卜一部分切丝，一部分切条。香菇泡软
腊肉虾干香菇红葱头切粒，放油炒香后倒萝卜进去一起炒软
粉盐糖胡椒粉全放进水里面，搅匀搅到糖融化，倒进炒萝卜的锅里，可以关火，倒完立刻搅拌，搅到粘稠了就可以盛到蒸盘里。大火蒸一个小时
steps_translated: Shred part of radish and cut part into strips. Mushroom Soaked Soft
Dried bacon, shrimp, shiitake mushrooms, and shallots, diced, sautéed in oil, then poured in radish and fried until soft

Put all the powder, salt, sugar, and pepper into the water, stir well until the sugar melts, pour it into the pot of frying radish, you can turn off the heat, stir immediately after pouring, until it becomes thick, you can put it in the steaming plate. steam for an hour

references.title: Turnip Cake
ingredients: 1/2 lb rice flour (not glutinous rice flour)
3 Chinese sausage, diced or 3 slices ham, shredded
5 dried Chinese mushrooms, soak in warm water,shredded or diced
steps: Cook shredded turnip with 1 cup of water for 5 minutes.
Add some sugar if turnip is bitter.
Heat 1 tspn of oil, stir fry Chinese sausage/ham, dry shrimp, mushrooms, shallots until done.
Add black or white pepper if desired.
Mix ingredients and rice flour with turnip.
Add salt if desired.
Note: this mixture should not be too thick.
Turnip cake will turn hard if it is too thick.
To steam: Choice (1) place step 5 mixture in a container and use steamer to steam for 50 minutes with high flame.
Choice (2) If you do not have a steamer, use 8x8x2 baking pan.
Cover baking pan with foil paper, pour in mixture.
In a large deep pan, add water, position a bowl in center of pan, then, place baking pan on top of bowl.
Put on lid and steam for 50 minutes with high flame.
Chill turnip cake in room temperature.
Slice cake into square or rectangular shape with a cleaver.
Fry in pan with 1 tbspn of oil until golden brown on both sides.
Sauce: Minced garlic and red chili pepper Mix with soy sauce, a drop of sesame oil and little bit of sugar.
Ready to serve.

source.title: 黑椒牛柳
steps: 各种翻炒，出锅。
steps_translated: All kinds of stir-fry, out of the pan.

references.title: Black Pepper Chicken Stir-Fry
ingredients: 1-1/2 pounds boneless skinless chicken thighs, cubed
Minced fresh cilantro and thinly sliced green onions
steps: In a small bowl, combine the first seven ingredients. Place cornstarch in a large bowl. Add chicken in batches; tossing to coat. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons oil over medium-high heat. Add chicken; cook and stir until no longer pink, 8-10 minutes. Remove and keep warm.

Stir-fry onion in remaining oil until tender. Stir soy sauce mixture and add to pan. Bring to a boil; cook and stir 1-2 minutes or until sauce is thickened. Return chicken to pan; heat through. Top with cilantro and green onions.

source.title: 回锅肉
steps: 选用肥瘦相间的五花肉，冷水冲干净后，锅里放水，加几片姜片、花椒、料酒与五花肉同煮，水烧开后再煮一会，用筷子戳一下没有血水就可以关火了，不用熟透的，待会还要烧了。
把煮过的五花肉取出用冷水冲干净沥干，用刀切成大小均匀的肉片待用。青椒切三角片待用。
锅烧热放底油，改小火，放入肉片用铲子划散。
加入料酒，煎到肉微微泛黄。
加入郫县豆瓣酱，改中火翻炒一下，再加入青椒片和一勺糖，翻炒一下。
青椒断生后关火，加入少量鸡精翻炒一下。鸡精不加也不要紧
出锅装盘，享用美食。
ingredients_translated: a small amount of chicken essence
steps_translated: Choose fat and thin pork belly, rinse it with cold water, put water in the pot, add a few slices of ginger, Chinese prickly ash, cooking wine and pork belly and cook together. After the water boils, cook for a while, poke it with chopsticks and turn off the fire if there is no blood. It doesn't need to be cooked through, it will be burned later.
Take out the cooked pork belly, rinse with cold water, drain, and cut into evenly sized pieces with a knife for later use. Cut the green pepper into triangular slices and set aside.
Heat the pot and put the base oil, turn the heat to low, add the meat slices and spread them with a spatula.
Add cooking wine and fry until the meat is slightly browned.
Add Pixian bean paste, stir-fry over medium heat, then add green pepper slices and a spoonful of sugar, and stir-fry again.
After the green peppers are broken, turn off the heat, add a small amount of chicken essence and stir fry. It doesn't matter if you don't add chicken essence
Put it out of the pan and enjoy the food.

references.title: Twice-Cooked Pork
ingredients: 1 tbsp each Vegetable oil, sesame oil
steps: Tear the cabbage and peppers into bite size pieces.
Marinate the pork in a plastic bag with 2 tablespoons of sake and 1/2 teaspoon of soy sauce.
Mix the ingredients marked with a together.
Heat vegetable and sesame oil in a pan.
Once it is starting to smoke, add the finely chopped ginger and garlic to the pan.
Once it becomes fragrant, add the katakuriko coated pork.
Heat vegetable and sesame oil in a pan.
Once it is starting to smoke, add the finely chopped ginger and garlic to the pan.
Once it becomes fragrant, add the flour coated pork.
Lay the cabbage and peppers over the meat and cover for about two minutes, until the cabbages becomes tender.
Add the seasonings and mix in to let the flavor absorb.
Feel free to add salt and pepper to taste.
That's all there is to it.

source.title: 担担面
steps: 锅烧热后，倒适量油，烧热，煸炒肉馅，把肉末煸至干香
加适量花椒粉，炒香
倒入葱姜蒜末，翻炒出香味
倒入宜宾碎米芽菜，炒匀后烹入黄酒，再倒入适量酱油炒匀
加适量辣椒粉
煸炒至均匀干燥，肉酥粒就做好了，出锅备用
准备100克的酱油
20克的香醋
把酱油和香醋倒入锅内，加50克白糖，煮开
将煮好的调味汁晾凉备用
芝麻酱加一点点香油和适量水泄开
将芝麻酱搅匀
将汤锅的水烧开，下入细面
油菜烫熟
将1大勺煮好的调味汁、1大勺辣椒红油、1大勺芝麻酱放入碗内，加一点花椒油或花椒面
再加几勺开水或鸡汤，搅匀后，面汤底就做好了。俺喜欢汤少一点的。
放入煮好的细面，撒香葱末
放上烫好的油菜和肉酥芽菜、撒花生碎即可
steps_translated: After the pot is heated, pour an appropriate amount of oil, heat it up, stir-fry the minced meat, and stir-fry the minced meat until it is fragrant
Add appropriate amount of pepper powder, sauté until fragrant
Pour in minced onion, ginger and garlic, stir-fry until fragrant
Pour in Yibin broken rice sprouts, stir well, add rice wine, then pour in appropriate amount of soy sauce and stir well
Add some chili powder
Stir-fry until evenly dried, the crispy meat is ready, take it out of the pan for later use
Prepare 100 grams of soy sauce
20 grams of balsamic vinegar
Pour soy sauce and balsamic vinegar into the pot, add 50 grams of sugar, boil
Let the cooked sauce cool down
Add a little sesame oil and some water to the sesame paste
Stir in the tahini
Boil the water in the soup pot, add the fine noodles
Rapeseed cooked
Put 1 tablespoon of cooked seasoning sauce, 1 tablespoon of chili red oil, and 1 tablespoon of sesame paste into a bowl, add a little pepper oil or pepper noodles
Add a few tablespoons of boiling water or chicken broth, stir well, and the noodle soup base is ready. I like less soup.
Add the cooked noodles, sprinkle with minced chives
Put the blanched rapeseed and crispy sprouts, and sprinkle peanuts

references.title: Dan Dan Noodles
ingredients: 1 pound frozen fresh wide Chinese egg noodles, thawed
1 tablespoon sambal oelek (ground fresh chile paste)
3/4 cup thinly diagonally sliced green onions
steps: Cook noodles in 6 quarts boiling water for 3 minutes. Drain in a colander over a bowl, reserving 3/4 cup cooking liquid. Place noodles in a large bowl.

Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add peanuts to pan; saute 2 minutes or until fragrant. Remove from heat; cool slightly. Combine peanut mixture, soy sauce, and next 4 ingredients (through ginger) in a mini chopper; process until finely ground.

Cook pork and salt in skillet over medium-high heat 8 minutes or until done, stirring to crumble. Add peanut mixture and 3/4 cup cooking liquid to pork; bring to a boil. Cook 1 minute, stirring frequently. Add pork mixture, juice, and onions to noodles; toss well. Place about 1 3/4 cup noodle mixture in each of 4 bowls; top each serving with 5 tablespoons cucumber and 1 tablespoon cilantro.

source.title: 红烧茄子
steps: 洗净切滚刀，撒盐杀水十分钟不建议太久会抽巴
等待的时候，青椒、切块
杀水后用水冲一下再用厨房吸水纸擦干打一个鸡蛋裹上粘炸鸡粉个人感觉比生粉好吃
某宝买一个小的炸锅，不浪费油，注意炸茄子低温哦，表面黄就好了
晾的时候调个酱汁：蒜末、生抽、耗油、糖以上根据自己的口味定量郫县豆瓣酱、番茄酱这两个放一点一点点、最后放温水三勺
起锅烧油，、青椒下锅翻炒半分钟放料汁，炒出香味入锅，出锅前放鸡精提香
steps_translated: Wash and cut the hob, sprinkle salt and kill water for ten minutes. It is not recommended to smoke if it takes too long
While waiting, bell peppers, diced
After killing the water, rinse it with water and dry it with kitchen absorbent paper. Beat an egg and wrap it in sticky fried chicken powder. Personally, it tastes better than cornstarch.
A certain treasure bought a small fryer, no waste of oil, pay attention to the low temperature of fried eggplant, the surface will be yellow

When drying, adjust the sauce: minced garlic, light soy sauce, oil consumption, sugar, and more according to your own taste, add Pixian bean paste and tomato sauce a little bit, and finally put three tablespoons of warm water

Heat the oil in a pan, stir-fry green peppers and green peppers for half a minute, add the sauce, stir-fry until fragrant and put in the pan, add chicken essence to enhance the aroma before leaving the pan

references.title: Eggplant With Garlic Sauce
ingredients: 4 Chinese eggplants, halved lengthwise and cut into 1 inch half moons
steps: Heat the canola oil in a skillet over high heat. Cook and stir the eggplant until soft, about 4 minutes. Stir in the water, red pepper flakes, and garlic powder. Cover and simmer until all the water is absorbed. Meanwhile, mix sugar, cornstarch, soy sauce, and oyster sauce in a bowl until sugar and cornstarch have dissolved. Stir sauce into the eggplant, making sure to evenly coat the eggplant. Cook until the sauce has thickened.

source.title: 鱼香茄子
steps: 干筷子放入油中有小气泡冒出差不多为四五成热
茄子切段，沾淀粉五成油温炸至表面金黄
豆瓣酱小火煸出红油
葱姜蒜末爆香，烹入料酒去酱料腥味
碗汁：盐1克、糖两勺满、生抽两勺、老抽一勺、醋三勺、淀粉一勺，拌匀收汁，碗中勺大小，豆瓣酱有咸味，其他有盐分要少些根据个人家中酱油盐咸度添加
将炸制好的茄子裹匀料汁出锅装盘
steps_translated: When the dry chopsticks are put into the oil, there are small bubbles coming out, which is about 40% to 50% hot
Eggplant cut into sections, dipped in 50% starch and deep-fried until the surface is golden
Stir-fry red bean paste on low heat
Saute minced green onion, ginger and garlic until fragrant, add cooking wine to remove the fishy smell of the sauce

Bowl of juice: 1 gram of salt, 2 tablespoons of sugar, 2 tablespoons of light soy sauce, 1 tablespoon of dark soy sauce, 3 tablespoons of vinegar, 1 tablespoon of starch, mix well to collect the juice, the size of a spoon in a bowl, bean paste has a salty taste, others have salt Add less according to the saltiness of soy sauce at home
Wrap the fried eggplant evenly in the sauce and put it on a plate

references.title: Eggplant In Garlic And Tomato Sauce
ingredients: 1 None eggplant, cut lengthwise into 1/3 inch slices, then widthwise into 1/3 inch strips
1 tbsp finely chopped fresh basil leaves
steps: Place eggplant in a colander and sprinkle with salt. Let stand for 30 mins then rinse under cold water. Pat dry with paper towels.
Heat 1/4 cup oil in a large frying pan. Cook 1/2 the eggplant strips until browned all over and soft. Set aside. Repeat with another 1/4 cup oil and eggplant strips.

Add remaining oil to pan and cook onion and garlic, stirring, until onion is soft. Add tomatoes, tomato paste, basil, sugar and 1/2 cup water. Season. Bring to a boil then reduce heat and simmer for 10 mins, or until sauce thickens. Add eggplant and mix until combined. Serve hot.

source.title: 脆皮五花肉
steps: 将五花肉冷水下锅，锅里放适量的料酒、大葱、姜片、花椒，因为懒我放了一包卤料也可以自己放点八角这些代替卤料
开锅后关小火再煮510分钟左右
捞出放凉后用叉子扎孔
将盘子里面倒入适量白醋，将猪皮向下浸泡10分钟左右。
趁浸泡的空闲时间来调调料：3勺生抽、q勺五香粉、1勺孜然粉、半勺白糖、1勺蚝油
将肉划一下，将调料放上去，尽量不要沾到皮上了。肉划开是方便肉入味
用锡箔纸包好，将皮露出来，再刷一次白醋放进冰箱冷藏一晚上，不用盖保鲜膜
烤箱预热上220，下200。将肉放进烤箱中上层烤30分钟
切块加生菜哈哈
steps_translated: Put the pork belly in a pot under cold water, put a proper amount of cooking wine, scallions, ginger slices, and peppercorns in the pot, because I am lazy, I put a pack of marinade, or you can put some star anise instead of marinade
After boiling, turn off the heat and cook for about 5-10 minutes
Remove and let cool, pierce with a fork
Pour an appropriate amount of white vinegar into the plate, and soak the pigskin down for about 10 minutes.
Adjust the seasoning while soaking: 3 spoons of light soy sauce, q spoons of five-spice powder, 1 spoon of cumin powder, half a spoon of sugar, 1 spoon of oyster sauce
Score the meat, put the seasoning on it, try not to get on the skin. Cutting the meat apart is convenient for the meat to taste
Wrap it in tin foil, expose the skin, brush it with white vinegar again and put it in the refrigerator overnight without covering it with plastic wrap
Preheat the oven at 220 and 200. Bake the meat in the upper rack of the oven for 30 minutes
Cut into pieces and add lettuce haha

references.title: Crispy Roasted Pork Belly
steps: Preheat oven to 325°. Make 1/4-inch-deep cuts in fattiest side of pork. Sprinkle pork with salt and pepper. Place in a large roasting pan. Place onion and next 5 ingredients around pork. Pour broth in pan, and cover tightly with aluminum foil.
Bake at 325° for 3 to 3 1/2 hours or until fork-tender. Remove pork from pan, and let stand 15 minutes. Discard vegetables and liquid in pan.
Cook pork in a large cast-iron skillet over medium-low heat 8 to 10 minutes on each side or until browned and crisp.

source.title: 宫保虾仁
steps: 虾仁去虾线、备用。动妈这次用的虾仁没有黑线，
将虾仁洗净沥干后，放入盐10g、土豆淀粉一勺15克、料酒10克与蛋清15克拌匀，放在冰箱里腌制整24小时，让虾仁吸收调料，吃透上劲。
取炒锅，放入10毫升油，烧热，将花生米入油锅，炸酥成金黄色放置一旁备用。
再将其余20毫升油放入锅中，烧热，把姜，葱，蒜放入油锅炒香，干辣椒，花椒再下锅翻炒。
接着将虾仁下锅炒香，再将剩余调料搅拌均匀分别倒入锅内大火收汁收汁的意思就是大火使汤汁蒸发这一项不能觉得收不收汁都一样最后放进花生米翻炒即可。
ingredients_translated: 30ml canola oil olive oil salad oil
steps_translated: Shrimp deveined and set aside. The shrimp that Dongma used this time has no black lines.

After washing and draining the shrimps, add 10g of salt, 15 grams of potato starch, 10 grams of cooking wine and 15 grams of egg white, mix well, and marinate in the refrigerator for 24 hours, so that the shrimps can absorb the seasoning and eat thoroughly.
Take a frying pan, put 10ml of oil in it, heat it up, put the peanuts into the oil pan, deep-fry until golden brown and set aside for later use.

Then put the remaining 20ml of oil into the pan, heat it up, put the ginger, green onion, and garlic into the oil pan and fry until fragrant, then put the dried chili and Chinese prickly ash into the pan and stir fry.
Then put the shrimps into the pot and fry until fragrant, then stir the remaining seasonings evenly and pour them into the pot separately to collect the juice. That's it.

references.title: Kung Pao Shrimp
ingredients: 1/2 - 1 teaspoon chili paste, depending on how hot you like it (like sambal oelek)
1 lb extra large shrimp, peeled and deveined
steps: Whisk together the broth, oyster sauce, chile paste, and cornstarch in a small bowl.
Heat the peanut oil in a large skillet over medium high heat.
Add shrimp and peanuts and cook, stirring, until the shrimp are just barely cooked (2 - 3 minutes). Transfer them to a plate.

Heat the sesame oil in the skillet, and saute the bell pepper until just barely tender (about 3 minutes). Then add the garlic and ginger to the skillet with the bell peppers and cook, stirring, until fragrant (about 1 minute).

Add the broth mixture to the pan with the pepper mixture. Bring to boil. When boiling, add the shrimp and peanuts and simmer until the sauce has thickened, about 1 minute. Make sure the shrimp are done (but not overcooked).
Serve over rice or lo mein noodles.

source.title: 核桃酥
steps: 核桃锅里炒3分钟左右
擀面仗擀碎
低筋粉里加入融化后的黄油，一个蛋黄，核桃碎
拌匀揉一下，烤箱上下175度预热10分钟
切成16个小剂子
用手摁成一个个小圆饼，可以加点葡萄干之类的，我用了扁桃仁
每一个刷上一层蛋黄
放入烤箱，上下火175度15-20分钟，如果已经上色了，千万看住，别烤焦了
steps_translated: Fry the walnuts for about 3 minutes
rolling pin
Add melted butter, an egg yolk, and chopped walnuts to the low-gluten flour
Mix well and knead, preheat the oven at 175 degrees for 10 minutes
Cut into 16 small doses
Press into small round cakes with your hands, you can add some raisins and the like, I used almonds
Brush each with egg yolk
Put it in the oven and heat it up and down at 175 degrees for 15-20 minutes. If it has been colored, be careful not to burn it

references.title: English Walnut Cookies
steps: Cream margarine and sugar.
Add egg and vanilla; beat until smooth.
Blend in flour, soda, and salt.
Add walnuts and cherries.
Form into a roll 2
1/2 inches wide.
Wrap in wax paper;
chill several hours.
Cut into thin slices, about 1/8 inch thick.
Place on ungreased baking sheet.
Bake in a 400 degree oven for 8-10 minutes until browned.

source.title: 香菇栗子鸡
steps: 原料
加工
焯水
熬糖
炒
添汤煮
加香菇
收汁调味
香菇栗子鸡
香菇栗子鸡
香菇栗子鸡
steps_translated: raw material
processing
Boiled water
Boil sugar
saute
add soup
add shiitake mushrooms
seasoning
Chestnut Chicken with Mushrooms
Chestnut Chicken with Mushrooms
Chestnut Chicken with Mushrooms

references.title: Moo Goo Gai Pan
steps: Cut chicken into strips.
Fry over high heat in 4 tablespoons oil for 5 minutes.
Add bamboo shoots, pea pods, celery, cabbage, water chestnuts, broth and soy.
Cover pan and steam for 5 minutes over medium heat.
Mix cornstarch with cold water.
Add to Moo Goo Gai Pan to thicken.
Serve with rice.
Serves 4.

source.title: 蜂蜜柠檬烤翅
ingredients: 根据个人口味添加勺黑胡椒
steps: 把翅根划开三刀，这样方便入味，也容易烤熟。
然后和调配好的酱汁蒜片一起腌制1小时。
把切好的柠檬薄片放在翅根上面，放入烤箱200加热20分钟后拿出来再表面层涂抹蜂蜜，再加热烤3分钟进行上色和最后的蜂蜜入味。
ingredients_translated: Add a spoonful of black pepper according to personal taste
steps_translated: Cut the root of the wing three times, which is convenient for flavor and easy to bake.
Then marinate with the prepared garlic slices for 1 hour.

Put the thinly sliced ​​lemon on the root of the wing, put it in the oven and heat it at 200 for 20 minutes, then take it out and apply honey on the surface, then heat and bake for 3 minutes to color and finally honey to taste.

references.title: Honey Soy Chicken Wings
steps: Cut tips off chicken and discard. Place wings in a non reactive shallow dish.
In a small bowl combine remaining ingredients, and mix well.
Refrigerate overnight, or a few hours.
Cook on a lightly oiled bbq grill for about 5 minutes each side on a med-high heat. (Adjust cooking time depending on your bbq) or until chicken is tender and cooked through.

source.title: 珍珠丸子
ingredients: 250克直接用绞肉也可以夹子肉盖板肉、五花肉都可以
10克我用的海天金标生抽生抽
150克请泡一小时以上，再沥干水份干糯米
steps: 三瓣蒜掰掉硬头，放入小美主锅
设置2秒反转5，剥蒜皮
拿掉蒜皮，放入5克姜
2秒速度8，打碎姜蒜，用刮刀将锅壁的刮到锅底
放入三个去皮的荸荠、20克胡萝卜、2朵泡发好的干香菇挤干水分
设置3秒速度6打碎
清空主锅如果准备的已经绞好的绞肉就不需要清空主锅
绞250克肉末，如果买的肉馅就忽略，正确绞肉的方法参考我下厨房的方子链接httpswwwxiachufangcomrecipe104190109groupsharetitlea
250克绞肉、之前切好的胡萝卜荸荠香菇碎、14茶匙胡椒粉、12茶匙盐、12茶匙糖、10克生抽我用的海天金标生抽、10克淀粉提前用少许水化开、10克葱花全部放入主锅。
1分钟反转速度3，上劲
做成小丸子，滚上糯米，放入小美蒸锅组如果主锅是一大锅汤可以在下层铺烘培纸，如果不是请忽略烘培纸
开水上锅蒸25分钟，或者600克冷水上锅蒸30分钟左右，根据丸子的大小适当调整时间。蒸丸子时，取和丸子同样数量的枸杞，用温水泡软，丸子快结束前沥干泡好的枸杞。
蒸好请把蒸笼取下来，每个丸子顶部放上枸杞点缀一下。
趁热享用。
ingredients_translated: 250 grams of ground meat can also be used directly, meat cover plate meat, pork belly can be used
10 grams of the Haitian Gold Standard soy sauce I use
a small handful of goji berries
150g, please soak for more than one hour, then drain the water and dry glutinous rice
steps_translated: Break off the hard ends of three cloves of garlic and put them into the Xiaomei main pot
Set 2 seconds reverse 5, peel the garlic
Remove the garlic skin and add 5 grams of ginger
2 seconds, speed 8, smash the ginger and garlic, scrape the wall of the pot to the bottom of the pot with a scraper
Add three peeled water chestnuts, 20 grams of carrots, and 2 soaked dried shiitake mushrooms and squeeze out the water
Set 3 seconds and speed 6 to break
Empty the mixing bowl If you are preparing ground meat you do not need to empty the mixing bowl
Grind 250 grams of minced meat. If you buy minced meat, ignore it. For the correct method of mincing meat, refer to the recipe link in my kitchen httpswwwxiachufangcomrecipe104190109groupsharetitlea

250 grams of minced meat, minced carrots, water chestnuts, and shiitake mushrooms, 14 teaspoons of pepper, 12 teaspoons of salt, 12 teaspoons of sugar, 10 grams of soy sauce I use Haitian Gold Label light soy sauce, 10 grams of starch dissolved in a little water in advance, 10 grams Put all the scallions into the mixing bowl.
1 minute reverse speed 3, push up
Make small balls, roll with glutinous rice, put into the Xiaomei Steamer, if the main pot is a large pot of soup, you can put baking paper on the bottom layer, if not, please ignore the baking paper

Steam in boiling water for 25 minutes, or 600 grams of cold water for about 30 minutes, adjust the time according to the size of the meatballs. When steaming the meatballs, take the same amount of wolfberry as the meatballs, soak them in warm water until soft, and drain the soaked wolfberries before the meatballs are almost finished.
After steaming, please take off the steamer, and decorate with goji berry on top of each meatball.
Serve hot.

references.title: Pearl Balls
steps: Rinse the rice until the water runs clear and then soak for an hour. Remove, rinse and drain in a sieve. Spread the rice on a flat plate and pat with a paper towel to remove the excess water.
Mix the pork with the water, wine, coriander, ginger, onions, salt and pepper and mix well to combine . Add the cornstarch and then mix. That's your filling all done.
Using a teaspoon dipped in water, scoop up spoonfuls and roll into balls.
When your meat balls are ready, roll them in the rice till they are completely coated.
Prepare a steamer by lining with a damp cloth. Place the pearl balls in, about 2 cm apart
Steam over high heat for half and hour
Remove and serve. I served mine with a passata made with ginger and coriander, though the chinese typically serve them with soy sauce.

source.title: 酱油炒饭
steps: 准备一大碗米饭，可以是剩饭，也可以现煮米饭，要煮的硬一点，放冷也可以放冰箱
锅里放沙拉油，放入米饭翻炒几下就放海鲜酱油，小火翻炒到上色均匀
可以适当的放喜欢的蔬菜。当然不放也很好吃
steps_translated: Prepare a large bowl of rice. It can be leftover rice or freshly cooked rice. It should be cooked harder, and it can also be stored in the refrigerator when it is cold.
Put salad oil in the pot, add rice and stir fry for a few times, then add seafood soy sauce, stir fry on low heat until the color is even
You can put your favorite vegetables appropriately. Of course it's delicious

references.title: Soy Fried Rice
ingredients: 14 oz. box Minute Rice, cooked (or 1 c. regular rice, cooked and drained)
1 c. cooked diced shrimp or 1 c. cooked diced pork
steps: Heat oil.
Add eggs, mixing constantly while breaking up with a fork.
Add eggs and onions to rice with soy sauce to color rice brown.
Add diced shrimp or pork.
Blend very well and serve hot.

source.title: 红烧牛肉面
steps: 牛肉焯水撇去浮沫，用温热水将捞出的牛肉清洗干净，放在一旁待用
将干辣椒剪成小段放在碗里，用凉水泡半个小时，待干辣椒吸水舒展后，将液体滤掉，辣椒放在一旁待用
在炖锅中加油，小火煸炒辣椒和青花椒，4-5分钟后加入洋葱碎继续煸炒，直到洋葱呈半透明状，此时加入焯水后干净的牛肉，随后加入热水没过牛肉
此时，往锅里加入八角，桂皮，姜片，酱油，盐，和豆瓣酱，盖上锅盖，中大火待国内沸腾后转小火，煮两个小时
炖牛肉的同时开始和面，中筋面粉和水的比例31揉成面团状，盖上保鲜膜醒20分钟后，将面团擀成饼状，双面涂油后用保鲜膜覆盖放置一个半小时，面饼充分吸收油脂后回非常有弹性
一个半小时后，将面饼切成若干条状，双手轻轻一拉就能均匀拉长，随即放入沸腾锅煮面，过程中记得浇两次凉水使面熟的透彻
捞出面，炖锅里的牛肉也差不多了，汤勺捞出一勺牛肉一勺汤就可以开饭了。祝大家enjoy。
steps_translated: Blanch the beef and skim off the foam, wash the beef with warm water, and put it aside for later use

Cut the dried chilies into small pieces and put them in a bowl, soak them in cold water for half an hour. After the dried chilis absorb water and stretch, filter out the liquid and put the chilis aside for later use

Add oil to the stew pot, stir-fry the chili and green peppercorns over low heat, add chopped onion and continue to stir-fry after 4-5 minutes until the onion is translucent, then add the cleaned beef after blanching, then add hot water to cover beef
At this time, add star anise, cinnamon, ginger slices, soy sauce, salt, and bean paste to the pot, cover the pot, turn to medium-high heat and cook for two hours after it boils.

While stewing the beef, start kneading the noodles. The ratio of all-purpose flour to water is 31 and knead into a dough. Cover with plastic wrap and let it rest for 20 minutes. The dough is very elastic after fully absorbing the oil

After an hour and a half, cut the noodle cake into several strips, stretch it evenly with a light pull with both hands, and then put it in a boiling pot to cook the noodle. During the process, remember to pour cold water twice to make the noodle cooked thoroughly
Take out the noodles, and the beef in the stew pot is almost the same. Take out a spoonful of beef and a spoonful of soup with the soup spoon to start the meal. I wish you all enjoy.

references.title: Oriental Beef Noodle Soup
ingredients: 2 ounces ramen instant noodle soup, 3 ea.
1/2 pound round steak Cooked, thinly sliced
steps: Mix water, soy sauce, shili sauce, ginger, pepper and one seasoning packet from the noodles in a large saucepan (reserve other packet for other use).
Bring to a simmer; add cabbage and carrot; cook 5 minutes. Add mushrooms, corn and noodles; simmer 3 minutes. Add beef and green onion. Heat through. Stir in sesame oil.
Note: cooked, chopped chicken may be used instead of beef.

source.title: 肥牛饭
steps: 西蓝花和胡萝卜抄熟备用，肥牛用沸水快速抄一下变色即出，洋葱切丝备用，勾兑调料汁一勺盐，两勺糖，两勺生抽，一勺耗油，两勺淀粉，半瓶矿泉水，一点点黄油，一点点白胡椒粉。
平底锅烧热加底油洋葱下锅炒软迅速加入肥牛快速翻炒，加入勾兑汤汁翻炒均匀关火。
碗中把米饭打底，铺上西蓝花和胡萝卜，加入炒好的洋葱肥牛，淋上汤汁。
出锅，赛过吉野家的招牌牛肉饭。如果用日本酱油代替生抽更好味道。
steps_translated: Cook the broccoli and carrots for later use, use the boiling water to quickly copy the fat beef to change color, shred the onion for later use, blend the sauce with a spoonful of salt, two spoonfuls of sugar, two spoonfuls of light soy sauce, one spoonful of oil, two spoonfuls of starch, Half a bottle of mineral water, a little butter, a little white pepper.
Heat the pan, add base oil, fry the onions until soft, quickly add the fat beef and stir fry quickly, add the blended soup, stir fry evenly, and turn off the heat.
Put the rice in the bowl, spread the broccoli and carrots, add the fried beef with onion, and pour over the soup.
Out of the pot, it is better than Yoshinoya's signature beef rice. It tastes better if Japanese soy sauce is used instead of light soy sauce.

references.title: Beef Steak Rice Bowl
steps: Take the beef out of the fridge.
Slice the onion into your desired thickness.
Cut the garlic into 5-6 slices.
Make the sauce with the soy sauce and mirin.
Sprinkle the beef with a small amount of salt and pepper.
Saute the garlic in vegetable oil until it starts to brown, then remove from the pan.
Add the meat.
Take the meat out just before your desired doneness, and stir-fry the onion.
Return the meat to the pan, and pour in the sauce.
Coat both sides of the meat with the sauce, and take it out from the pan.
Serve rice in a bowl, and put the onion on top.
Leave the sauce in the pan.
Slice the meat diagonally into strips, and serve on top.
Pour the simmered sauce all over, and sprinkle with garlic and chopped green onions.

source.title: 手擀面
steps: 400克面粉加
1克盐
放入适量的水，和成面团
在菜刀板上撒上面粉，防止它粘上去，擀面杖最好用大的，把它擀得比菜刀板还要大。
擀成菜刀板那样大的时候，把它叠成如图的长方形块块，用菜刀把它切成细条条
切成这样
切好之后，把它用手翻一翻，弄散就行，放到盘子或锅架上
把韭菜切碎，放入味精，鸡精，盐，酱油，生抽，香油
鸡蛋打碎放到锅里搅搅，捞出放入调料碗里，卤子就做好了
烧水下面
浇上卤子，这样就大功告成了
steps_translated: 400g flour plus
1 gram salt
Add appropriate amount of water and make dough
Sprinkle flour on the cutting board to prevent it from sticking. It is best to use a large rolling pin to make it bigger than the cutting board.
When it is as big as a kitchen knife board, stack it into rectangular blocks as shown in the figure, and cut it into thin strips with a kitchen knife
cut like this
Once you've cut it, turn it over with your hands to loosen it up and place it on a plate or pot holder
Chop the leeks, add monosodium glutamate, chicken essence, salt, soy sauce, light soy sauce, sesame oil
Crack the eggs and stir them in the pot, take them out and put them in the seasoning bowl, the marinade is ready
under boiling water
Pour the brine and you're done

references.title: Homemade Noodles
steps: Put flour in a deep narrow bowl (small mixing bowl).
Make a well in the flour.
Put the 3 eggs and salt in the well.
Begin whipping with a fork.
Gradually the eggs will pick up more and more of the flour.
Keep whipping until you have a soft ball of dough.
Dump onto well floured board.
Knead more flour in until you have a stiff dough that is no longer sticky.
Divide into 3 balls.
Roll out about 1/8 inch thick, making sure your dough is well floured on top and bottom.
Pick up and turn over (should be larger than a pie shell), then cut in 3 to 4 inch wide strips. Stack; flouring well between each strip.
After they are all rolled and stacked, cut across stack to desired width of noodles (1/4 inch).
Cook in large kettle of meat stock or just plain water that you add a teaspoon of salt and 2 tablespoons of oil to. Takes 20 to 30 minutes to cook.

source.title: 小米粥
steps: 锅里水烧开
接着倒入洗好的小米
大火烧开后小火慢炖
小火慢慢直至煮至小米粥浓稠即可。
一碗营养美味的小米粥出锅了
steps_translated: Boil the water in the pot
Then pour in the washed rice
Bring to a boil then simmer slowly
Slowly cook on low heat until the millet porridge is thick.
A bowl of nutritious and delicious millet porridge is out

references.title: Millet Porridge
ingredients: 1/2 cup skim milk or 1/2 cup soymilk
honey or other artificial sweetener, to taste
steps: In a small saucepan, combine millet, water, milk, cinnamon, vanilla, salt and raisins.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 25 minutes without stirring.
If the liquid is not completely absorbed, cook for 3-5 minutes longer, partially covered.
Remove from heat.
Drizzle with maple syrup or honey.
Serve.

source.title: 狮子头
steps: 全家福
鸡蛋，淀粉，葱，姜末，猪肉搅碎，加入瑶柱，盐。混在一起
成一个圆
入油锅煎
热锅，最好用鸡汤。然后下其他东西
完美
steps_translated: family portrait
Eggs, starch, green onion, minced ginger, minced pork, add scallops, salt. mixed together
into a circle
pan fry
Hot pot, preferably chicken stock. then download something else
Perfect

references.title: Lion'S Head Meatballs
ingredients: 1 lb. lean ground pork or beef
1/4 c minced leeks, white and pale green part only.
2 t. Seeded and minced fresh chile pepper
1 medium head o rBoston or iceberg lettuce
steps: Combine coconut milk, soy sauce, and curry powder in a large saucepan. Set aside.

Place pork, scallions, leek, cornstarch, flour, seame oil, ginger, chile, salt and pepper in a large mixing bowl. Knead by hand until thoroughly combine and the mixture becomes sticky. Divide into 10 equal portions, about 1/4 c. each. Roll each portion into a ball.

Heat olive oil Ina large skillet over medium heat, swirling to coat the sides. Add meatballs and cook, turning occasionally until browned on all sides, 8 - 10 minutes. Transfer to a plate lined with paper towels.
Bring coconut milk mixture to a boil over medium heat. Add meatballs, co Ed, reduce heat to low and cook for 8 minutes.
Line serving bowl with lettuce leaves. Arrange the meatballs on top. Garnish with basil and lemon zest. Serve hot with the coconut milk sauce drizzled over the top or on the side for dipping.

source.title: 羊肉抓饭
ingredients: 适量羊肉最好是羊羔肉
适量我用的两个胡萝卜
steps: 第一步是泡米，提前30分钟把要用到的米用冷水浸泡
羊肉加入了适量的姜片冷水下锅煮
煮开后撇去第一道与第二道出来的泡沫，然后大火煮20分钟，直至羊肉可以用筷子轻松戳入
羊肉煮好后盛出并用温水冲一道，晾干
盛出羊肉后锅里剩余的羊汤也装好备用煮米饭
胡萝卜洋葱切丝备用
热锅倒入适量油，加入少量姜末，倒入羊肉翻炒，直至煸出香味
倒入洋葱继续翻炒，并加入适量盐所需盐的一小半
继续加入胡萝卜翻炒，并加入3至3勺羊汤熬煮
熬煮至看见少量橘黄色汤汁加入剩下的盐，准备起锅
泡好的大米与烹调好的羊肉一起搅拌均匀放入电饭锅，并加入适量的羊汤不需要在加额外的清水，所有煮饭的水以羊汤代替
电饭锅显示煮好后用大勺把米饭翻动均匀并加入适量黑胡椒粒，盛出即可享用
ingredients_translated: Appropriate amount of mutton, preferably lamb
steps_translated: The first step is to soak the rice, soak the rice to be used in cold water 30 minutes in advance
The mutton is boiled in a cold water pot with an appropriate amount of ginger
After boiling, skim off the foam from the first and second pass, then cook on high heat for 20 minutes, until the mutton can be poked easily with chopsticks
After the mutton is cooked, take it out and rinse it with warm water, and dry it
After the mutton is served, the remaining mutton soup in the pot is also ready for cooking rice
shredded carrot onion
Pour an appropriate amount of oil into the hot pan, add a small amount of minced ginger, pour in the mutton and stir-fry until the fragrance comes out
Pour in the onion and continue to stir fry, and add a small half of the salt required for the right amount of salt
Continue to add carrots and stir fry, and add 3 to 3 spoons of mutton soup to cook
Cook until you see a small amount of orange soup, add the remaining salt, and prepare to cook

Stir the soaked rice and the cooked mutton evenly into the rice cooker, and add an appropriate amount of mutton soup. There is no need to add additional water, and all the cooking water is replaced by mutton soup
When the rice cooker shows that it is cooked, use a large spoon to stir the rice evenly and add some black peppercorns, take it out and enjoy

references.title: Lamb Pilaf
ingredients: 1 lb. lamb shoulder, cubed and rubbed with garlic
steps: Brown lamb and onions until very dark.
Stir constantly. Place in a casserole with the seasonings, water and rice.
Be sure to add salt for the rice.
Cover and bake in a moderate oven until rice is cooked and water is absorbed.

source.title: 糖醋排骨
steps: 菠萝苹果去皮切小块，锅中放清水，熬煮至苹果菠萝熟烂，我是前一天晚上用电饭煲熬的
熬出的汤汁，放一汤匙番茄酱和3汤匙白醋醋量可以根据个人口味，喜欢酸的朋友可以多放一点，煮开做成酸甜汤备用
葱拍碎切段，姜切丝，排骨用清水焯一下，水一开马上捞起沥干
捞起的排骨放碗中加葱段姜丝，少许生抽、料酒、水淀粉一汤匙即可，不想要有着厚厚外衣的糖排腌制15分钟左右
锅中放油加热至9成，放入排骨
3秒钟后立即关火保证排骨的肉还是嫩的，用筷子翻动一下
捞起，用排骨表面的余油还可以继续加热一会儿
浓汤宝兑水一大碗，倒入锅中
放老抽生抽根据排骨的量按差不多1：15比例、少许盐
倒入事前做好的酸甜汤
加热，在煮沸前就可以下排骨了。你可以把熟烂的菠萝和苹果块一同放进去煮，吃的时候，你还可以吃到菠萝粒哦苹果一般都会完全化掉
盖上锅盖，大火煮开，水分汤汁耗去一半的时候，转小火炖至汤汁稠，出锅前撒上白芝麻即可
steps_translated: Peel the pineapple and apple and cut them into small pieces. Put water in the pot and boil until the apple and pineapple are cooked. I boiled it in a rice cooker the night before.

Put 1 tablespoon of tomato paste and 3 tablespoons of white vinegar in the boiled soup, the amount of vinegar can be according to personal taste, friends who like sour can put a little more, boil to make sweet and sour soup for later use
Chop the green onion and cut into sections, shred the ginger, blanch the pork ribs in clean water, pick up and drain as soon as the water boils

Pick up the spare ribs and put them in a bowl, add shredded green onion and ginger, a little light soy sauce, cooking wine, and a tablespoon of water starch. If you don’t want to have a thick coat, marinate for about 15 minutes
Put the oil in the pot and heat it to 90%, add the ribs
After 3 seconds, turn off the heat immediately to ensure that the meat of the ribs is still tender, and turn it over with chopsticks
Take it out and use the remaining oil on the surface of the ribs to continue heating for a while
Mix a large bowl of thick soup treasure with water and pour it into the pot
Add dark soy sauce and light soy sauce according to the amount of ribs in a ratio of about 1:15, a little salt
Pour in the pre-made sweet and sour soup

Heat up and the ribs are ready to serve just before the boil. You can put the rotten pineapple and apple pieces together to cook, and you can still eat the pineapple pieces when you eat it. Apples will usually be completely melted
Cover the pot and bring to a boil over high heat. When half of the water in the soup is consumed, turn to low heat and simmer until the soup is thick. Sprinkle white sesame seeds before serving.

references.title: Sweet And Sour Ribs
ingredients: 4 lb. pork spareribs, cut in portions
steps: Wipe ribs with a damp paper towel.
Bake on rack in shallow pan at 450° for 35 minutes.
Combine remaining ingredients in pot and cook until slightly thickened.
Remove rack from roasting pan; drain grease.
Put ribs in bottom of pan; pour sauce over ribs. Cover tightly with foil.
Bake 1 1/2 hours at 350°.

source.title: 台湾版盐酥鸡
source.title_translated: The Taiwan version of the soufflé.
steps: 鸡腿去骨留皮，切小块，多洗几次，去腥。
下酱油，玉米淀粉，胡椒粉，五香粉，盐，蒜末，姜，葱，料酒腌制2个钟头。
4勺面粉，4勺地瓜淀粉，10勺水，半勺五香粉，一点点盐，调成面糊。再准备一碗地瓜淀粉。腌制好的鸡腿肉块，粘一边面糊，再沾上地瓜淀粉，下到油锅里小火炸。
准备炸。
炸到7分熟，捞起来放凉。
凉后再入锅重炸。这样才会外焦里嫩，更加好吃。必须炸两次哦，不然口感会差很多。九层塔过油后就可以了。味道独特
重炸后，放到吸油纸上，撒上椒盐，开动啦
开动
ingredients_translated: 4 spoons of sweet potato starch in a bowl
steps_translated: Remove the bone and leave the skin on the chicken legs, cut into small pieces, wash several times to remove the fishy smell.
Add soy sauce, cornstarch, pepper, five-spice powder, salt, minced garlic, ginger, onion, cooking wine and marinate for 2 hours.

4 spoons of flour, 4 spoons of sweet potato starch, 10 spoons of water, half a spoon of five-spice powder, a little salt, and make a batter. Prepare another bowl of sweet potato starch. The marinated chicken thighs are sticked with batter on one side, then dipped in sweet potato starch, and then fried in a frying pan over low heat.
Ready to fry.
Fry until 7 minutes cooked, remove and let cool.

Let it cool down and then re-fry it. This will make the outside charred and tender inside, which will be more delicious. It must be fried twice, otherwise the taste will be much worse. After the basil is oiled, it will be fine. unique taste
After heavy frying, put it on oil-absorbing paper, sprinkle with salt and pepper, and start
start

references.title: Fried Chicken
steps: Mix all ingredients together in plastic bag and shake well. Coat chicken well and fry in deep fat until well cooked. Especially good for a picnic.

source.title: 脆皮日本豆腐
steps: 干香菇泡发，嫌麻烦的用新鲜的就好。
日本豆腐连包装中间切一刀，去掉外包装，在均匀切块。动作温柔点。
豆腐均匀的裹上淀粉。
锅里放油，七成热的时候放入豆腐块，仍然是温柔点，每个豆腐间大一点，粘连就废了
炸好的豆腐，豆腐要多炸一会，表皮脆脆的内里仍然软软的，
配菜：洋葱，胡萝卜，香菇通通切丁，锅烧热倒油，一起扔进去。
配菜炒熟后放入豆腐，如果炸的好，其实是不怕翻的。稍微温柔点就可以。
倒入所有料汁生抽，耗油，盐，糖，鸡精
最后水淀粉勾芡，关火。水要多一些，有汤汁才好吃。
开动吧
steps_translated: Dried shiitake mushrooms are soaked in hair, if you find it troublesome, use fresh ones.
Cut Japanese tofu with a knife in the middle of the package, remove the outer package, and cut into pieces evenly. Be gentle.
Coat the tofu evenly with starch.
Put oil in the pot, put in tofu cubes when it is 70% hot, it is still gentle, the space between each tofu is bigger, and the adhesion will be useless
Fried tofu, tofu needs to be fried for a while, the skin is crispy and the inside is still soft,
Side dishes: Dice onions, carrots, and shiitake mushrooms, heat up a pan, pour oil, and throw them in together.
After the side dishes are cooked, add tofu. If it is fried well, it is not afraid of turning over. Just be a little gentler.
Pour in all the sauce, light soy sauce, oil consumption, salt, sugar, chicken essence
Finally, thicken with starch and turn off the heat. More water is needed, and the soup is delicious.
let's start

references.title: Crispy Fried Tofu
ingredients: 1 1/2 teaspoons fresh clementine or orange juice
Two 14-ounce packages extra-firm tofu, drained well and cut into 8 rectangles each
steps: Make the Tofu In a baking dish, whisk the mirin, soy, lime juice, clementine juice and 1/4 cup of water.
Add the tofu and turn to coat.
Refrigerate for 2 to 4 hours, turning once; pat dry.
Meanwhile, Make the Plum Sauce In a saucepan, heat the vegetable oil.
Cook the onion and garlic over moderate heat, stirring, until the onion starts to brown.
Add dark brown sugar, black plums and tamarind paste.
Cook, stirring, until soft, about 12 minutes; let cool.
Transfer sauce to a blender and pulse with Sriracha until nearly smooth.
Season with salt and set aside.
Meanwhile, Make the Plum Sauce In a shallow dish, spread 1 cup of the rice flour.
In another shallow dish, whisk the eggs with the milk and the remaining 2 cups of rice flour.
Spread the panko in a third shallow dish.
Dredge the tofu in the flour, the egg mixture and then the panko, lightly patting the coating to help it adhere.
Meanwhile, Make the Plum Sauce In a large saucepan, heat 1 1/2 inches of oil to 325.
Fry the coated tofu in batches, turning, until deep golden, 7 minutes.
Transfer to paper towels to drain and season with salt.
Serve hot, with the Plum Sauce.

source.title: 辣椒小炒肉
steps: 肉切好放酱油腌制一下
首先把肉先随便炒一下，盛起来待用
倒入蒜，豆鼓，辣椒小炒
蒜豆鼓
辣椒
最好把肉倒入辣椒中翻炒均匀加入酱油调味
开胃爽口辣椒炒肉好啦
steps_translated: Cut the meat and marinate it in soy sauce
First, fry the meat casually, put it up and set it aside
Pour in garlic, bean drum, chili and stir fry
Garlic Bean Drum
chili
It is best to pour the meat into the chili and stir fry evenly, add soy sauce to taste
Appetizing and refreshing chili fried meat is ready

references.title: Pork And Pepper Stir Fry
ingredients: 1 bunch green onions, sliced into 1 inch pieces
8 oz broccoli florets, blanched in boiling water for 1-2 mins, drained
8 oz rice noodles, softened in boiling water for 2-3 mins, drained
steps: Heat oil in a wok or frying pan. Add pork and stir-fry for 8 mins. Add pepper, cumin, garlic, green onions and sesame oil. Stir-fry for 2-3 mins. Add broccoli, chili sauce, soy sauce and 4 tbsp water. Stir-fry for 2 mins. Add herbs and noodles and toss to combine. Serve.

source.title: 蜜汁排骨
steps: 放入蜜汁排骨调料cook100蜜汁烤肉料，与排骨混合，搅拌均匀，腌制1小时
烤盘铺上锡纸，将腌好的排骨摆放好
烤箱预热220度，中层，上下火35分钟
ingredients_translated: cook100 New Honey Sauce Barbecue Ingredients
steps_translated: Put in the honey sauce pork ribs seasoning cook100 honey barbecue meat, mix with the ribs, stir evenly, and marinate for 1 hour
Cover the baking tray with tin foil, and arrange the marinated ribs
Preheat the oven at 220 degrees, the middle layer, fire up and down for 35 minutes

references.title: Honey Dijon glazed ribs
steps: In a pot large enough to hold the ribs, add the mustard seed, onion, vinegar, celery, bay leaf, peppercorns and enough water to cover.
Bring ribs to boil, reduce heat and simmer for about 45 minutes.
Drain off liquid and remove the ribs.
Light your bbq and when hot, place ribs on the grill.
Baste with honey Dejon mustard for 10 to 15 minutes.
Watch carefully that the mustard does not get too scorched.

source.title: 云南小锅米线
steps: 取小锅放水适量，待水烧涨下白菜煮。
然后放酸菜，下米线，最后下韭菜和杂酱。涨，起锅，搞定
steps_translated: Take an appropriate amount of water in a small pot, and cook the cabbage when the water boils.
Then put sauerkraut, rice noodles, and finally leeks and miscellaneous sauce. Rise up, cook up, get it done

references.title: Thai Rice Noodle Soup
ingredients: 1 teaspoon dried chilies or 14 fresh chili pepper
steps: add the fresh ginger, soy sauce, tsp lemongrass/seame mix and oil to pan.
saute for 30seconds.
heat prawns and add water, coconut milk, chili, remaining lemongrass, dash of soy sauce, peas, ground ginger and leave to simmer for 5-8mins on a reduced heat.
Add broken noodles, lime juice and miso.
Simmer for further 5mins.
serve!
as a starter for an oriental rice based dish, perhaps?

source.title: 糯米糍
steps: 将椰浆粉类混合倒进盆里
用手动打蛋器搅拌均匀
黄油隔水融化
将黄油倒进面糊里，搅拌均匀
搅拌均匀的面糊倒进瓷碗里盖上保鲜膜，电磁炉开大火放入蒸锅里蒸20分钟左右
蒸好的面糊
盖上保鲜膜再静置放凉
将面皮分成25克一个的小剂子，豆沙馅20克
用擀面棍将面皮擀开
包进豆沙馅
将面皮收口收紧
表面裹上椰蓉，糯米糍就做好了
很棒的味道保鲜半小时后吃口感更好哦
steps_translated: Mix the coconut milk powder into the basin
Mix well with a hand mixer
butter melted
Pour the butter into the batter and mix well
Pour the evenly stirred batter into a porcelain bowl, cover with plastic wrap, turn on the induction cooker and steam in a steamer for about 20 minutes
steamed batter
Cover with cling film and let it cool
Divide the dough into small doses of 25 grams each, 20 grams of red bean paste
Roll out the dough with a rolling pin
stuffed with red bean paste
Tighten the skin
Wrap the surface with shredded coconut, and the glutinous rice cakes are ready
It tastes great. It tastes better after being kept fresh for half an hour.

references.title: Coconut Mochi
steps: Mix all ingredients and pour into a greased or Pam sprayed 9 x 13-inch pan. Sprinkle top with sesame seed and bake at 350° for 1 hour.
Slice and enjoy.

source.title: 上海熏鱼
steps: 将鱼洗净去磷去内脏，切成15cm左右厚度片状，用厨房纸吸干表面水分，放在阴凉处吹干。大概1天左右
起油锅，中火加热。放入姜片，等油温足够时准备放入准备好的鱼片。
每次以鱼片在油中平摊不迭起为好。炸得微黄，翻过来炸另外一面。
将两面都炸之金黄色即可。
捞起，略滴滴油，趁热放入酱汁。
酱汁制作：将生姜，葱，酱油，料酒，水倒入锅中，根据个人口味放入糖，盐，鸡精调味。小火煮开即可。
入蘸汁后，还会发出吱-啦一声，静置一段时间，然后捞出沥一下潮湿的汁料，放入盘中。
steps_translated: Wash the fish, remove phosphorus and viscera, cut into slices about 15cm thick, blot the surface moisture with kitchen paper, and blow dry in a cool place. about 1 day
Take a frying pan and heat over medium heat. Put in sliced ​​ginger, and when the oil is warm enough, prepare to put in the prepared fish fillets.
It is better to spread the fish fillets evenly in the oil every time. Fry until lightly browned, turn over and fry the other side.
Fry both sides until golden brown.
Take it out, add a little bit of oil, and put it into the sauce while it is hot.
Sauce making: Pour ginger, green onions, soy sauce, cooking wine, and water into the pot, and add sugar, salt, and chicken essence to taste according to personal taste. Bring to a boil over low heat.
After dipping in the juice, there will be a squeak, let it stand for a while, then remove the wet juice and put it on the plate.

references.title: Smoked Fish
ingredients: few drops red food coloring (if desired)
steps: Soak fish in cold brine 12 to 18 hours.
Rinse fish; pat dry. Smoke fish 8 to 12 hours.

source.title: 蛋饺
steps: 鸡蛋打匀，肉末加入胡椒粉、生抽、砂糖、盐、生粉、葱末拌匀备用
懒病发作，不写可以吗看图看图
都做好之后就放入蒸锅蒸15分钟就可以上桌了哦
steps_translated: Beat the eggs well, add pepper, light soy sauce, sugar, salt, cornstarch, and minced green onion to the minced meat, mix well and set aside
Laziness attacks, can you not write? Look at the pictures.
After everything is done, put it in the steamer and steam for 15 minutes and it is ready to serve.

references.title: Egg Dumplings
ingredients: 2 Tbsp. Shortening, Melted Fat or Salad Oil
steps: Mix flour, baking powder and salt; set aside.
Beat egg and add milk, shortening and add all ingredients together.
Spoon dumplings on top of your broth.
Cook uncovered for 10 minutes and covered for 10 minutes.

source.title: 春卷
steps: 荠菜洗干净，焯水。并与猪肉一起，依次放进调味料，鸡蛋，搅拌均匀
根据图片样折叠即可。
锅里倒入色拉油，将油温烧至5成热，放入包好的春卷，炸至两面金黄就可以啦
steps_translated: Wash the shepherd's purse and blanch. And together with the pork, put in the seasoning, eggs in turn, and stir well
Fold according to the picture.
Pour salad oil into the pot, heat the oil to 50% heat, put in the wrapped spring rolls, and fry until golden on both sides.

references.title: Pork Spring Rolls
ingredients: 225 g water chestnuts, drained and finely chopped
steps: Mix together, in a large bowl, pork mince, cabbage, onion, coriander, sambal oelek, garlic and ginger.
Using one spring roll sheet at a time, place approximately 2 tablespoons of mix just in from one corner.
Brush edges with water, fold over corner near mix, then 2 outside corners. Roll up fairly tightly to enclose filling.
Repeat with the rest of the spring roll sheets.
Heat oil in wok or deep fryer. (It will be hot enough when a cube of bread sizzles when added.).
Deep-fry spring rolls 4 or 5 at a time for 5-8 minutes or until lightly golden.
Remove with slotted spoon and drain on paper towel.
Serve immediately with your choice of dipping sauce.

source.title: 番茄馄饨汤
steps: 番茄放水里煮一下，去皮切碎。
锅中热油，放葱花爆香，放切碎的番茄翻炒，加水煮开，放酱油，盐，鸡精调味。
把馄饨放入番茄汤中，馄饨快熟时把蔬菜放入一起煮。出锅撒香菜。
steps_translated: Boil tomatoes in water, peel and chop.
Heat oil in a pan, sauté chopped green onion until fragrant, stir fry chopped tomatoes, add water to boil, add soy sauce, salt, and chicken essence to taste.
Put the wontons into the tomato soup, and when the wontons are almost cooked, add the vegetables to cook together. Serve with parsley.

references.title: Wonton Soup
ingredients: 1 lb. rib bones or neck bones
steps: Boil rib bones or neck bones.
Chill; skim fat.
Spoon pork hamburger into wonton wrapper.
Drop it in boiling soup.
Serve green onions and sprinkle with wontons.

source.title: 芙蓉蛋
steps: 先剁碎梅头肉，放点油，盐，水，生抽，你也可以放点鸡精。然后搅拌好放在锅里蒸
打两个鸡蛋
搅拌好后隔掉上面那层泡泡
然后用薄膜封住，在上面刺几个小洞。最后放锅里大火蒸到水开后3分钟转中火再蒸10分钟
最后把蒸好的肉放在芙蓉肉上就了
steps_translated: First chop the plum head meat, put some oil, salt, water, light soy sauce, you can also put some chicken essence. Then stir well and put it in the pot to steam
crack two eggs
After stirring, the top layer of bubbles is separated
Then seal it with film and pierce a few small holes in it. Finally, put it in the pot and steam on high heat until the water boils for 3 minutes, then turn to medium heat and steam for 10 minutes
Finally put the steamed meat on the hibiscus meat

references.title: Egg Foo Young
ingredients: 1/2 pound shrimp, peeled, deveined and roughly chopped
steps: In a skillet over medium heat, heat sesame oil and lightly fry the onions, celery and sprouts. Stir in cornstarch and add shrimp, soy sauce and salt. Stir until well blended. Remove from heat and transfer to a bowl.

Return the pan to the heat, and add the beaten eggs. Fry the eggs while stirring gently. Return the vegetable and shrimp mixture to the pan while the eggs are still liquid. Finish frying until eggs are fully cooked.

source.title: 炒面
steps: 一袋买的玉米面条，已经是熟的了
锅内放油烧热，加入葱花和肉丁，待肉丁变白后加入蘑菇
倒入面条，翻动几下后倒入菠菜，最后放入几勺酱油和适量盐，待炒面变成金黄色后即可出锅
steps_translated: Corn noodles bought in a bag are already cooked
Put the oil in the pot and heat it up, add chopped green onion and diced meat, add mushrooms after the diced meat turns white

Pour in the noodles, turn it over a few times, pour in the spinach, and finally add a few tablespoons of soy sauce and an appropriate amount of salt, and wait until the fried noodles turn golden brown, then you can take it out of the pan

references.title: Chow Mein
ingredients: 1 lb. meat (beef, pork, chicken or shrimp)
1 large can Chinese vegetables (reserve 1/4 cup liquid)
steps: Fry meat until brown.
Stir in bouillon, celery, onion, soy sauce and monosodium glutamate.
Heat to boiling.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer 30 minutes.
Shake reserved liquid and cornstarch in covered container.
Stir gradually into meat.
When thick, add vegetables and heat thoroughly.
Serve over rice and chow mein noodles.

source.title: 湖南小炒肉
steps: 五花肉切薄片，青尖椒和蒜苗滚刀切，小米辣对半切，姜和蒜切片。
干净的锅烧热，直接下青尖椒到锅里烧出虎皮乘出。
下油烧热，放姜片蒜片和蒜苗炒出香味。然后拨到一边，下五花肉炒几下，合着姜蒜和蒜苗一起炒。放老抽上色。下青椒和小米辣翻炒，加盐，出锅
steps_translated: Thinly sliced ​​pork belly, hob-cut green peppers and garlic sprouts, halved spicy millet, sliced ​​ginger and garlic.
Heat up a clean pot, put green peppers directly into the pot and burn out the tiger skin.

Heat the oil, add ginger slices, garlic slices and garlic sprouts and stir-fry until fragrant. Then put it aside, stir-fry the pork belly a few times, and stir-fry together with ginger, garlic and garlic sprouts. Put old soy sauce to color. Stir-fry green pepper and millet spicy, add salt, and take out of the pan

references.title: Pork Stir-Fry
steps: Brown pork in 1 tablespoon oil.
Add 2 tablespoons soy sauce. Set aside.
Steam vegetables in 1 tablespoons oil and 1/2 cup water.
Add pork back to vegetables.
Sprinkle Sloppy Joe, ginger, garlic salt and seasoning salt over and mix well.
Add rest of soy sauce.
Simmer 5 minutes.
Serve over rice or noodles.

source.title: 黑椒鸡丁
ingredients: 一个选个稍大点的尖椒
steps: 尖椒、洋葱切小块儿备用
鸡腿肉切一厘米左右小丁，加胡椒、少许盐、料酒、淀粉、食用油拌均，腌制备用
锅中倒油，不要太多，因为炒鸡腿肉还会出油，炒至鸡肉变色盛出
直接用底油炒香姜片、洋葱、尖椒
加入适合自己口味量的黑椒酱炒香
放入鸡丁继续炒
加入黑胡椒碎，蚝油、糖、盐调味
装盘，盛米饭，开动吧
ingredients_translated: Appropriate amount of black pepper sauce
Appropriate amount of thin salt soy sauce
Appropriate amount of crushed black pepper
steps_translated: Peppers and onions cut into small pieces for later use
Cut the chicken thigh into small cubes about one centimeter, add pepper, a little salt, cooking wine, starch, and cooking oil, mix well, and marinate for preparation
Pour oil in the pan, not too much, because the fried chicken thigh will still produce oil, fry until the chicken changes color and comes out
Stir-fry ginger slices, onions, and peppers directly with base oil
Add the amount of black pepper sauce that suits your taste and sauté until fragrant
Add chicken and continue to fry
Add crushed black pepper, oyster sauce, sugar, salt to taste
Plate, serve rice, let's go

references.title: Black Pepper Chicken Stir-Fry
ingredients: 1-1/2 pounds boneless skinless chicken thighs, cubed
Minced fresh cilantro and thinly sliced green onions
steps: In a small bowl, combine the first seven ingredients. Place cornstarch in a large bowl. Add chicken in batches; tossing to coat. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons oil over medium-high heat. Add chicken; cook and stir until no longer pink, 8-10 minutes. Remove and keep warm.

Stir-fry onion in remaining oil until tender. Stir soy sauce mixture and add to pan. Bring to a boil; cook and stir 1-2 minutes or until sauce is thickened. Return chicken to pan; heat through. Top with cilantro and green onions.

source.title: 橙味冬瓜
steps: 冷水加盐煮沸腾加入切好薄片的冬瓜片继续煮沸，煮个一分钟感觉冬瓜味会变淡
撇掉开水，加凉水冲凉
再放净化水过一遍
这是事先冲好的橙味粉用深点的碗，方便浸泡放冷冻柜一段时间因为降温快
捞出冬瓜片放入橙味水中
因为冬瓜密度小，我压了个味碟继续放入冰箱冷藏最好时间久点，半天最好我只放了两小时感觉味道还差了点
捞出装盘，点缀了半个提子切片应该再薄点入味会更好泡的水都被娃们喝点掉了，哈哈哈
steps_translated: Add cold water and salt to boil, add thinly sliced ​​wax gourd slices and continue to boil, cook for a minute and feel the taste of winter melon will fade
Skim off the boiling water and add cold water to take a shower
Put purified water again
This is the pre-prepared orange flavor powder, use a deeper bowl, it is convenient to soak and put it in the freezer for a period of time because it cools down quickly
Take out the wax gourd slices and put them in the orange flavored water

Because the density of winter melon is small, I pressed a saucer and continued to put it in the refrigerator for a longer time. It is best to put it in half a day for only two hours. I feel that the taste is not good.
Take it out and put it on a plate, garnish with half a raisin slice, it should be thinner and taste better

references.title: Spicy Orange Beef Stir Fry
ingredients: 6 each scallions, spring or green onions sliced
steps: Combine beef bouillon, water, marmalade, seasonings and cornstarch.
In large skillet, stir fry onion, peppers and carrots in oil, until tender.
Add beef and continue to stir fry.
Add beef bouillon mixture and cook until thickened.
Simmer 2 to 3 minutes.
Serve over hot rice.
Garnish with orange segments, if desired.

source.title: 鸡汤面
ingredients: 适量配菜木耳，春菜，蒜片，葱花
steps: 原鸡汤少量加水，放入蒜片，加盐烧热，鸡胸肉撕成丝加入汤内。
另起一锅加水烧热，先放入青菜和木耳焯熟，取出备用。放入面条煮熟，我选用的是外面鲜面铺子里面当天做好的细面，挂面也是可以的。
把面捞出来，上面摆上青菜木耳，浇上汤汁，撒上葱花就好了。
ingredients_translated: Appropriate amount of side dishes, fungus, spring vegetables, sliced ​​garlic, chopped green onion
steps_translated: Add a small amount of water to the original chicken soup, add garlic slices, add salt and heat it up, tear the chicken breast into shreds and add it to the soup.

Take another pot and add water to heat it up. Put in the green vegetables and fungus and blanch until cooked, then take it out and set aside. Put in the noodles and cook. I choose the fine noodles made on the same day in the fresh noodle shop outside. Dried noodles are also available.
Take out the noodles, put green vegetables and fungus on top, pour soup, and sprinkle chopped green onion.

references.title: Chicken Noodle Soup
steps: Simmer chicken in salt water, in a covered pan, until tender (a frying chicken will take about 45 minutes).
Remove chicken from broth; cool enough to handle.
Remove skin and bones; chop meat.
Add water to broth (if needed) to make 5 cups.
Bring to a boil.
Add chicken, vegetables and spices.
Simmer, covered for 20 minutes.
Add noodles; simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes or until noodles are tender.
Yields 6 servings.

source.title: 菊叶蛋汤
steps: 买回来的菊花叶，掐除老梗，洗净
将鸡蛋打入碗中，加盐，用筷子充分搅打均匀待用
汤锅烧开水，水滚后下菊花叶
再滚时将打散的蛋液浇入，稍凝固成型后加适量盐、滴点麻油
放油盐后煮1分钟关火，放适量味精起鲜，稍冷后食用
steps_translated: The bought chrysanthemum leaves, cut off the old stems, washed
Crack the eggs into a bowl, add salt, beat well with chopsticks and set aside
Boil water in a soup pot, add chrysanthemum leaves after the water boils
When rolling again, pour in the beaten egg liquid, add some salt and drop some sesame oil after it solidifies slightly
Add oil and salt, cook for 1 minute, turn off the heat, add an appropriate amount of monosodium glutamate to freshen up, and eat after cooling down

references.title: Egg Drop Soup
ingredients: 3 Tbsp. cornstarch, mixed with 1 c. cold water
steps: In large saucepan, boil chicken broth and onions.
String beaten egg while stirring.
Add salt and pepper.
Add cornstarch mixture to thicken.
Continue to boil until thickened.
Add corn, if desired.
Serve in bowls.
Serves 4 to 6.

source.title: 西红柿鸡蛋面
steps: 葱花切丁，西红柿切小块，起锅少油，下入葱花，西红柿，大火炒，放入一点水，把西红柿炒化，加入平时煮泡面的水量，等水开。
打入两个鸡蛋，等鸡蛋快熟了，下入泡面，酱包，蔬菜包，粉包，用筷子把泡面迅速滑散，散开后15s关火，捞出，这样方便面不会太软，吃着好吃
来吃非常美味
steps_translated: Dice the chopped green onion, cut the tomato into small pieces, start the pan with less oil, add the chopped green onion, tomato, stir-fry on high heat, add a little water, fry the tomato, add the amount of water used to cook instant noodles, and wait for the water to boil.

Beat in two eggs, wait until the eggs are almost cooked, put in the instant noodles, sauce packets, vegetable packets, and flour packets, and quickly scatter the instant noodles with chopsticks. soft, delicious
come to eat very delicious

references.title: Tomato Noodle Soup
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package ramen noodles, any flavor
steps: Cook noodles in water according to package directions.
DO NOT DRAIN.
Add soup and simmer 5 minutes, stirring ossasionally.

source.title: 番茄蛋汤
steps: 番茄洗净，头部切一个十字花刀。放在开水中氽烫一会儿，然后用自来水过凉，去皮。再切片备用。鸡蛋敲入碗中打散。香葱切圈备用。
锅置火上倒少许植物油，入番茄翻炒，再加入适量清水或高汤烧开，加入稀释好的土豆生粉，调均匀，用盐和鸡精调味儿，再淋入蛋液，待蛋液飘浮成片状时关火，淋几滴香油，撒上葱花，即刻出锅。
ingredients_translated: Appropriate amount of salt, sesame oil, chicken essence
steps_translated: Wash the tomatoes and cut the head with a cross knife. Blanch them in boiling water for a while, then cool them in tap water and peel off the skin. Slice and set aside. Crack the eggs into a bowl and beat. Cut shallots into rings and set aside.

Put a little vegetable oil on the fire, stir-fry the tomatoes, then add some water or broth to boil, add the diluted potato starch, mix well, season with salt and chicken essence, then pour in the egg liquid, and wait for the egg liquid to float Turn off the heat when it is in flakes, pour a few drops of sesame oil, sprinkle with chopped green onion, and take it out of the pan immediately.

references.title: Egg Drop Soup
steps: Scald milk.
Pour over dried bread that has been seasoned with a little sugar and salt.
Serve in a coffee cup.

source.title: 酸汤水饺
steps: 准备材料的过程煮水，水开下速冻饺子
把所有的材料备好装大碗，吃面吃水饺必备的大碗，食材缺一不可，否则味道就不是这样的了，具体分量视个人喜好决定
注意扑锅，水开加两回冷水基本也就熟了
确认熟透直接倒入碗里
搅拌均匀开吃，超爽啊
steps_translated: In the process of preparing materials, boil water, boil the water and put quick-frozen dumplings

Prepare all the ingredients and put them in a large bowl. It is necessary to eat noodles and dumplings. The ingredients are indispensable, otherwise the taste will not be like this. The specific weight depends on personal preference.
Pay attention to the pot, the water is boiled and the cold water is added twice, and it is basically cooked
Confirm that it is cooked and pour it directly into the bowl
Stir well and eat, super refreshing

references.title: Chicken Dumpling Soup
ingredients: 1 parsley root cream in color, carrot-like
steps: Cut up chicken (hen) into parts and rinse well. Cover chicken with water; go 1 inch over top of chicken. Bring to a boil. Once at a rapid boil, spoon off cream-colored residue and add the diced onion. Cook for 2 hours. Put in the parsley root (cut it as you would carrots) and the carrots, celery and diced parsley. Add 2 tablespoon salt. Cook 1 hour.

Mix milk and water; add to eggs and add a little salt. Add flour until mixture does not fall off your spoon. It will be a thick, gooey mixture! 1/2 teaspoon makes 1 dumpling. Put in a pot of boiling water. Only fill pot approximately 1/2 full since these dumplings take up a lot of room. Cook dumplings for 45 minutes. Lid on pot should be tipped. Add dumplings to chicken soup and enjoy!

source.title: 香辣牛肉面
ingredients: 除了花椒一小撮，其他各一个草果，大料，花椒，桂皮
steps: 牛腩切块焯水。表面杂质略干净，高汤留出备用。
另起锅，适量油，下入葱姜蒜，大料花椒草果爆香。接着下入郫县豆瓣酱，炒出红油，加入牛腩块翻炒。
牛肉煸炒微黄加入老抽，生抽，料酒翻炒均匀
加入番茄块，番茄酱，冰糖翻炒几下，连同之前的高汤一起倒入高压锅，上气小火压40分钟。
最后开盖放盐，大火收汁。吃面的话略微多一点汤，不要收的太浓稠
最后就是煮面条啦，来一个面碗，舀上几勺牛肉汤，把煮好的面条放进去，加一勺面汤，再来一勺牛肉，来点配菜或者香菜，开动吧
ingredients_translated: In addition to a pinch of peppercorns, each other has a grass fruit, aniseed, peppercorns, and cinnamon
a small handful of rock sugar
Some dark soy sauce cooking wine
steps_translated: Cut the beef brisket into pieces and blanch. The surface impurities are slightly cleaned, and the broth is reserved for later use.

In another pot, add some oil, add onion, ginger, garlic, aniseed prickly ash, grass fruit and sauté until fragrant. Then add the Pixian bean paste, stir-fry the red oil, add the beef brisket and stir-fry.
Stir-fry the beef until lightly yellow, add dark soy sauce, light soy sauce, cooking wine and stir-fry evenly
Add tomato cubes, tomato sauce, and rock sugar, stir fry for a few times, pour into the pressure cooker together with the previous broth, and press on low heat for 40 minutes.
Finally, open the lid, add salt, and collect the juice on high heat. If you eat noodles, add a little more soup, don't make it too thick

The last is to cook the noodles. Come to a noodle bowl, scoop up a few spoonfuls of beef soup, put the cooked noodles in it, add a spoonful of noodle soup, another spoonful of beef, some side dishes or coriander, let’s start

references.title: Spicy Chicken Noodle Soup
steps: Coat chicken in parsley, cumin, coriander, cayenne and turmeric.
Cover and place in fridge while you prepare your veges.
In a large non stick pot, fry onion and bacon and set aside.
Brown chicken and set aside.
Now add stock, potatoes, carrot, celery and bacon and onion.
Bring to boil and simmer until veges have softened.
Chop chicken 2cm pieces and throw into soup along with peas and corn and noodle.
Cook until chicken is finished cooking through and noodles are soft.
Salt and pepper to serve.
So easy, so very tasty.
Enjoy!
